programme.title: The Recruit
Kill Bill
Kill Bill: Vol. 1
programme.desc:
The Recruit: Directed by Roger Donaldson. With Al Pacino, Colin Farrell, Bridget Moynahan, Gabriel Macht. A brilliant young CIA trainee is asked by his mentor to help find a mole in the Agency." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0292506/","name":"The Recruit","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE5MDMzOTk3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNTE0NTg2._V1_.jpg","description":"A brilliant young CIA trainee is asked by his mentor to help find a mole in the Agency.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0292506/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"UACW"},"dateCreated":"2006-10-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Ambiguous?","reviewBody":"Ironic this movie's made by Spyglass? Or is it? Isn't there ambiguity there as well?

Nothing is what it seems.

Yes the writers could have gone over their screenplay and given it another one-two and that may have raised the caliber another notch, but this is still good entertainment. It won't change your life, but it will be a well spent couple of hours.

And it's true the movie could in theory have had a more sophisticated (ambiguous) ending, but there comes a time, after wading through all the trollop on the market, that one just sinks back and decides to enjoy a better movie for all it's worth.

And this is such a movie: directed by the capable Roger Donaldson who directed the taut thriller No Way Out and co-authored by a writer on The Natural, this one keeps going at a brisk pace with excellent editing and super soundtrack from Klaus Badelt of POTC1 fame. Farrell - who actually comes off smaller than life what with all the tripe written about him, and that's not a bad thing - and former fashion model Moynahan make the sparks fly. You feel for the protagonists and that's an essential ingredient of any good movie.

But Pacino: he's great at whatever he does but is he fated to have secondary roles now? Bah.

There's a bit of a 'Spy Game' feel to things but there's no shameless copying going on. There just aren't many movies in this genre. And Spy Game doesn't have the thrill and suspense this one has. Yes, you might eventually figure everything out before the denouement, but you won't be upset. And odds are you won't figure everything out anyway - some yes; all of it - no.

As for that ending: some people would perhaps prefer more ambiguity. On several planes. Others would say the ending is ambiguous enough. At least on one plane, perhaps several.

Nothing is what it seems."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":132914,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2003-04-30","keywords":"recruit,training,watching tv,jefferson memorial,smithsonian institute","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Recruit","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi499253529","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDlhYTM4ZWItOTE3OC00ZjVkLWI0OWMtOTUxZGIxMDljZGU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDlhYTM4ZWItOTE3OC00ZjVkLWI0OWMtOTUxZGIxMDljZGU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"CT #2 Post"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000199/","name":"Al Pacino"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0268199/","name":"Colin Farrell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002044/","name":"Roger Donaldson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049348/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031181/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0166202/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870013/","name":"Roger Towne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934483/","name":"Kurt Wimmer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0322248/","name":"Mitch Glazer"}],"duration":"PT1H55M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
Kill Bill 2
Kill Bill: Vol. 2
programme.desc: Kill Bill: Vol. 2: Directed by Quentin Tarantino. With Vivica A. Fox, Ambrosia Kelley, Michael Parks, James Parks. The Bride continues her quest of vengeance against her former boss and lover Bill, the reclusive bouncer Budd, and the treacherous, one-eyed Elle." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0378194/","name":"Kill Bill: Vol. 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmFiYmJmN2QtNWQwMi00MzliLThiOWMtZjQxNGRhZTQ1MjgyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzQ1ODk3MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Bride continues her quest of vengeance against her former boss and lover Bill, the reclusive bouncer Budd, and the treacherous, one-eyed Elle.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0378194/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Coventry"},"dateCreated":"2004-04-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Tarantino's Triumph: Volume Two","reviewBody":"Rarely \tknown a movie I've been looking forward to so much than Q.T's resumption of the Kill Bill saga. I, as well as millions of others film-freaks, awaited Uma Thurman's further adventures with wicked anticipation. And of course Tarantino didn't disappoint. Volume two is a completely different movie than volume one, but it's equally brilliant and the director's trademarks are shown more than obviously. Volume one merely was homage to the Eastern Martial Arts movies, with delightfully over-the-top splatter and gore while Vol. 2 fully focuses on ancient westerns and rural horror. There's more dialogue, more twists n turns and the anti-chronological structure results in more depth and involvement. Some unexplained elements from Vol.1 become clear now and even the entire background of Thurman's character gets unveiled. For the very first time, (as far as I can remember) Tarantino really knows how to create an unbearable tension! There's a sequence in which Uma is buried alive and trapped under the ground Through simple methods, like a completely black screen, Tarantino arises claustrophobia among the audience! Truly terrific filmmaking. \n\nThe actors in Kill Bill aren't Hollywood's best, but they each have their charisma and their typical Tarantino characters do the rest. The camera viewpoints are brilliant at times and  as usual  the tiny absurd elements are a joy to discover. Tarantino's entire Kill Bill achievement may easily be considered as one of the most creative and dared film-projects ever! Do yourself a favor and watch them! Over and over again.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":719464,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2004-12-08","keywords":"bride,vengeance,revenge,female assassin,martial arts","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Kill Bill: Vol. 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi405667865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjA3OThlOWUtZWZiYi00M2I2LTg0Y2QtNWY2YThjZjE4Y2U1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjA3OThlOWUtZWZiYi00M2I2LTg0Y2QtNWY2YThjZjE4Y2U1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"CT #1, post"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000235/","name":"Uma Thurman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001016/","name":"David Carradine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000514/","name":"Michael Madsen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000233/","name":"Quentin Tarantino"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019267/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086625/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000233/","name":"Quentin Tarantino"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000235/","name":"Uma Thurman"}],"duration":"PT2H17M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Knowing
Zapowiedź
Knowing
programme.desc:
Knowing: Directed by Alex Proyas. With Nicolas Cage, Chandler Canterbury, Rose Byrne, Lara Robinson. M.I.T. professor John Koestler links a mysterious list of numbers from a time capsule to past and future disasters and sets out to prevent the ultimate catastrophe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0448011/","name":"Knowing","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMyMjgyMDIyM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjg3MjAyMg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"M.I.T. professor John Koestler links a mysterious list of numbers from a time capsule to past and future disasters and sets out to prevent the ultimate catastrophe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0448011/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"pugmahorn"},"dateCreated":"2009-03-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Good, The Bad and the Ugly","reviewBody":"The good: Strong start to the movie, the plot hooks you in, excellent sound, confronting disaster scenes, haunting images, Rose Byrne, at times quite freaky, The Bad: Special effects looked like they were from a video game, ripped off basically every science fiction movie ever made, poor acting from Nic Cage, very predictable.

The Ugly: Last third of movie was shamefully ridiculous.

Summary: If you are a science fiction fan, you will probably not be able to resist seeing this movie. Be warned, you will think you are seeing the sci-fi great that you have been waiting for but mid way the film gets lost. You may very well groan out loud at the ending. The Ugly: Last third of movie was shamefully ridiculous.

programme.title: La virgen de los sicarios
Matka boska morderców
La Virgen de los sicarios
programme.desc: La virgen de los sicarios: Directed by Barbet Schroeder. With Germán Jaramillo, Anderson Ballesteros, Juan David Restrepo, Manuel Busquets. The tempestuous love story between Fernando, an older man who has recently returned to his crime-ridden drug capitol hometown of Medellin, Colombia and the gun-happy 16-year-old assassin Alexis, who murders all too easily. When Alexis himself is fatally gunned down, grief-stricken Fernando hunts for his young lover's killer in the Medellin slums, but instead encounters Wilmar, who bears an uncanny resemblance to Alexis." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0250809/","name":"La virgen de los sicarios","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODgyZGY1OGYtOTRlMy00OWJhLThjYTItZTcxOTdmMDhiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjk1Njg5NTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The tempestuous love story between Fernando, an older man who has recently returned to his crime-ridden drug capitol hometown of Medellin, Colombia and the gun-happy 16-year-old assassin Alexis, who murders all too easily. When Alexi","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0250809/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"eroka"},"dateCreated":"2001-07-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"A realistic and subversive film","reviewBody":"I saw the film at the Jerusalem Film Festival. It was a rather late screening, but the viewers were glued to their seats. It's a very gripping movie and extremely subversive in themes, language and visuals. It's very anti current-day Colombia, and no wonder the production didn't go very smoothly. Still I admire the support the film got from `official' institutions in Medellion. It's subversive in themes, because we basically have a gay couple, an older man (about 40-50) who indulges in having sex with minor boys (who do this willingly, and yet, it's rather shocking to the average viewer) in return for financial support, or rather indulging the boys in whatever they want to do. The couple goes around the city and is critical of every facet of the city  and rightly so  yet the tone is overtly cynical and `evil'. The lead boy, Alexis, goes around and kills whomever is threatening him and his sugar-daddy  I think he executed 4 people once a confrontation was about to happen, and 4 more were other kids who were after him. S this shooting spree is depicted in a somewhat accepting manner, as if this is the way to do these things in Colombia. They ridicule almost every aspect of life  church, police, government, the drug lords, poor and beggars, the bourgeoisie, other gays, and even themselves. In that respect, it's a very Pasolini movie, although the realism here is a real one and not made for the sake of a socialist agenda. The writer and his two boy-lovers are very lost, although they always know where they are, and the ending is pretty bad, as expected. The film shows no hope for the Colombian people, as they are stuck in a country ran by corrupt officials, gangs and drug lords. The writer has great lines, one of my favorite was about him hating people who whistle, because they shouldn't try and imitate the art that was given to the birds A good movie, with a 7/10 as far as I can say. Acting-wise  since I don't speak Spanish, it was credible to my ears, though the boys did seem to quote their lines mechanically at times."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3924,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2000-09-20","keywords":"male full frontal nudity,teenage boy,male frontal nudity,anti natalism,antinatalism","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Our Lady of the Assassins","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1634731801","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjBlOTBiYzktZmQ0My00YmI3LThlMzgtN2JhZDVlZTAzZWVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjBlOTBiYzktZmQ0My00YmI3LThlMzgtN2JhZDVlZTAzZWVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for this film from Barbet Schroeder"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0418554/","name":"Germán Jaramillo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050774/","name":"Anderson Ballesteros"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0720461/","name":"Juan David Restrepo"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0775447/","name":"Barbet Schroeder"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052216/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086602/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0884982/","name":"Fernando Vallejo"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: II koncert na wiolonczelę i orkiestrę
programme.desc: Pasją okulisty Macieja Gasika jest muzyka. W trakcie jednego z koncertów mężczyzna doznaje udaru mózgu. Staje się więźniem własnego ciała. Postanawia się nie poddawać i zawalczyć o swoją godność oraz wolność. Film na podstawie prawdziwej historii. Scenariusz stworzono do koncertu wiolonczelowego Pawła Mykietyna.

programme.title: Honour
Honorowe zabójstwo
Honour
programme.desc: Honour: With Keeley Hawes, Mark Stanley, Michael Jibson, Alexa Davies. DCI Caroline Goode vows to bring justice for a young girl, murdered by her family for falling in love with the wrong man." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt10535076/","name":"Honour","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjBmMjVhMTktOTdiMS00OTBiLWE5MzAtMjdlYWU0NDFmNjI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTMyODgwOTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"DCI Caroline Goode vows to bring justice for a young girl, murdered by her family for falling in love with the wrong man.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10535076/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"InnerWisdom1000"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Necessary Viewing for All","reviewBody":"Firstly, I would like to express my disappointment at so many reviewers here who simply missed the key point of this production: the killing ( or so-called honour killing ) of another human being as a defence of one's culture or religion or for any other reason. In this case the reprehensible, degrading and evil treatment of women by segments of men whose actions can only be described as vile, caustic, inhuman and downright evil. So many viewers sadly glossed over this fundamental issue. Sadly.\n\nOf course we can give our views on whether there were too few episodes or not enough, or how true or not the events depicted relate to what actually happened, or whether the director or production team or actors excelled themselves or not. For me, they were all excellent. But that is to miss the point: murder is never justified under ANY circumstances. No matter your family or cultural upbringing. No matter your religion or any other justification. IMDb data; ttnr: 10535076, Title: Honour, --- Description: Honour: With Keeley Hawes, Mark Stanley, Michael Jibson, Alexa Davies. DCI Caroline Goode vows to bring justice for a young girl, murdered by her family for falling in love with the wrong man." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt10535076/","name":"Honour","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjBmMjVhMTktOTdiMS00OTBiLWE5MzAtMjdlYWU0NDFmNjI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTMyODgwOTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"DCI Caroline Goode vows to bring justice for a young girl, murdered by her family for falling in love with the wrong man.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10535076/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"InnerWisdom1000","dateCreated":"2021-01-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Necessary Viewing for All","reviewBody":"Firstly, I would like to express my disappointment at so many reviewers here who simply missed the key point of this production: the killing ( or so-called honour killing ) of another human being as a defence of one's culture or religion or for any other reason. In this case the reprehensible, degrading and evil treatment of women by segments of men whose actions can only be described as vile, caustic, inhuman and downright evil. So many viewers sadly glossed over this fundamental issue. Sadly.\n\nOf course we can give our views on whether there were too few episodes or not enough, or how true or not the events depicted relate to what actually happened, or whether the director or production team or actors excelled themselves or not. For me, they were all excellent. But that is to miss the point: murder is never justified under ANY circumstances. No matter your family or cultural upbringing. No matter your religion or any other justification. That a young girl ( or anyone for that matter ) should be so inhumanly and despicably treated - culminating in her murder - is something which should outrage all of us...","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2063,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2020-09-28","keywords":"missing woman,police,london england,2000s,based on true story","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0369954/","name":"Keeley Hawes","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4440305/","name":"Mark Stanley","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1106960/","name":"Michael Jibson"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0677560/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0752152/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0685539/"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Honour","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi193249561","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDYwZmFmNjktYWIxMi00ZGQwLTk2ODAtNTE1MGM3Y2QxNjYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDYwZmFmNjktYWIxMi00ZGQwLTk2ODAtNTE1MGM3Y2QxNjYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Honour"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Sauver ou périr: Directed by Frédéric Tellier. With Pierre Niney, Anaïs Demoustier, Vincent Rottiers, Chloé Stefani. The heartbreaking hero's journey and true story of a Paris fireman, husband and dad." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7210426/","name":"Sauver ou périr","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWFhZWMzNWItMGNkYi00ZTlkLTgxZGQtOTVlOTJlMDU1MzZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTc5OTMwOTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"The heartbreaking hero's journey and true story of a Paris fireman, husband and dad.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7210426/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ronevickers"},"dateCreated":"2020-04-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Memorable & Emotional Film.","reviewBody":"This is a quite magnificent film on so many counts. Inspired by true events, this story of the human spirit, overcoming all the odds, will remain long in the memory. Everything about it is top notch - direction, cinematography, script and, most of all, the acting. All play their parts exceptionally well, with Pierre Niney in the lead role being particularly outstanding. His range of emotions, in a difficult part, dominate the film, and he confirms the fact that he is a brilliant actor. This is a must see movie for anyone who appreciates film making at its best.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1298,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-11-28","keywords":"fireman,fire,fireman training,building on fire,fire fight","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2670312217","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWNiM2I3YjEtNjY2MC00MjA4LTg1MzYtNGJjN2ZmNmNkYTY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWNiM2I3YjEtNjY2MC00MjA4LTg1MzYtNGJjN2ZmNmNkYTY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2582755/","name":"Pierre Niney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1326732/","name":"Anaïs Demoustier"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1196219/","name":"Vincent Rottiers"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1595335/","name":"Frédéric Tellier"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0536467/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0261946/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0044140/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1190532/","name":"David Oelhoffen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1595335/","name":"Frédéric Tellier"}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dzień jak co dzień
programme.desc: Ania z córką Basią jadą na casting do telewizyjnego talent show. Z dziewczynką zaczyna dziać się coś dziwnego, ale matka tego nie zauważa. Podczas występu Basia wybiega ze sceny. Ania musi zmierzyć się ze swoimi kompleksami, by dostrzec i zrozumieć potrzeby córki.

programme.title: The Rossellinis
Klan Rossellinich
The Rossellinis
programme.desc:
The Rossellinis: Directed by Alessandro Rossellini, Lorenzo d'Amico de Carvalho. With Alessandro Rossellini, Isabella Rossellini, Renzo Rossellini, Roberto Rossellini. This documentary recounts the lives of Roberto Rossellini's children from the perspective of Alessandro Rossellini, the first grandson of the director." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt12749696/","name":"The Rossellinis","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTkxOTA1YzItNmIzNS00OGM1LTk5NmEtYmE3YWQwY2E4MTA1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjQ0MjA3Njk@._V1_.jpg","description":"This documentary recounts the lives of Roberto Rossellini's children from the perspective of Alessandro Rossellini, the first grandson of the director.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt12749696/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"nickrogers1969"},"dateCreated":"2021-09-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fascinating to watch","reviewBody":"This is a very interesting documentary about a big and famous family. The director, who is a grandchild of Roberto Rosselini, has made a loving portrait of his aunts and uncles. The director seems to be a nice and warm person and he has much love for his family living across the world.

My observations about the family after having watched it is that Ingrid Bergman's daughter Ingrid Rosselini is the true beauty of the family. Elletra, Isabella's daughter, would not be working as a model if it were not for her famous mother. The scene with Isabella modelling on the runway with her children is lame.

The scenes of the director with his mother were the most touching in the film and is what stays with me. There seems to be a warm close bond between them despite them not having seen each other for years. Those scenes were the most hopeful and intimate.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":104,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"genre":["Documentary","Biography","History"],"datePublished":"2020-10-26","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1529407/","name":"Alessandro Rossellini"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000618/","name":"Isabella Rossellini"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0744022/","name":"Renzo Rossellini"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1529407/","name":"Alessandro Rossellini"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5030454/","name":"Lorenzo d'Amico de Carvalho"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0258681/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066197/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0312397/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3324087/","name":"Andrea Paolo Massara"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1529407/","name":"Alessandro Rossellini"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3309810/","name":"Davis Simanis Jr."}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Wiedźma
Ma-nyeo
programme.desc: Ja-yoon (Da-mi Kim) w wieku siedmiu lat ucieka z tajemniczego budynku rządowego, wskutek czego zaczyna cierpieć na amnezję. Dziecko znajduje stare małżeństwo, które postanawia się nim zaopiekować. Żeby pomóc przyszywanym rodzicom, nastoletnia już Ja-yoon występuje w programie telewizyjnym. Pojawienie się dziewczyny w mediach rozpoczyna serię kolejnych niespodziewanych wydarzeń w jej życiu.

programme.title: Duelles
Instynkt matki
Duelles
programme.desc:
Duelles: Directed by Olivier Masset-Depasse. With Veerle Baetens, Anne Coesens, Mehdi Nebbou, Arieh Worthalter. When a sudden tragedy uproots the lives of two women and their families, they begin to question the relationships they once held so dear, in this psychological thriller from Olivier Masset-Depass." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7377132/","name":"Duelles","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDk0ZGNlNDctNWRiNy00YzUxLTgyMzEtMWNiMGEyYWUzODNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTc5OTMwOTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a sudden tragedy uproots the lives of two women and their families, they begin to question the relationships they once held so dear, in this psychological thriller from Olivier Masset-Depass.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7377132/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TheDragonTrader"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"A slowly illuminating red light","reviewBody":"After a tragic accident shatters the friendly alliance between two neighbours, they start harassing each other to find out who really was responsible for what happened. While the audience at first thinks it was a perfectly banal accident, their doubt is being fuelled scene after scene...

Veerle Baetens' en Anne Coessens' performances are filled with subtle mistrust and held-back anger. These two characters playing off each other are a true feast for the spectators. Also the young Jules Lefebre acts with a maturity beyond his years. The cinematography by Hichame Alaouie is effective and - even though the pace at times threatens to slow down a bit too much - keeps every scene interesting and fresh: playing with angles, lighting and other effects to signify the slow descent into madness. Olivier Masset-Depasses' direction is clean, whilst never sinking into blandness.

However, the omnipresent score is overblown and lacks subtlety, but regularly does capture the right atmosphere for the scene. The story after a while threatens to loose its own point, but regains its footing again in the finale. And what a chilling finale that was! One last nit-picking comment can be that the film could have raised uncertainty and suspicion even more than it in fact did.

Finally, one cannot ignore the not-so-subtle hints to Hitchcock's work in the production design, costumes and building of tension. It's expertly done and - in my humble opinion - this movie is perfectly capable of standing between great names such as 'Rear Window' and 'The Man Who Knew Too Much'. A shame it only came out in 2018, because back in the 60's, it would have perplexed it's audiences. It's not without drawbacks, but then again... which one of Hitchcock wasn't?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1439,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"genre":["Drama","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2019-04-17","keywords":"female friends,paranoia,death of a child,deadly fall,conflict between friends","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4235639321","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzg0NWI3ZjgtY2JhMi00YTI3LTg1ZWEtMmM1YTliM2JlYzExXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzg0NWI3ZjgtY2JhMi00YTI3LTg1ZWEtMmM1YTliM2JlYzExXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0046424/","name":"Veerle Baetens"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0168783/","name":"Anne Coesens"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0623854/","name":"Mehdi Nebbou"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0557267/","name":"Olivier Masset-Depasse"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0071388/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030799/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0282520/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3038158/","name":"Barbara Abel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0311488/","name":"Giordano Gederlini"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0557267/","name":"Olivier Masset-Depasse"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

When a sudden tragedy uproots the lives of two women and their families, they begin to question the relationships they once held so dear, in this psychological thriller from Olivier Masset-Depass." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7377132/","name":"Duelles","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDk0ZGNlNDctNWRiNy00YzUxLTgyMzEtMWNiMGEyYWUzODNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTc5OTMwOTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a sudden tragedy uproots the lives of two women and their families, they begin to question the relationships they once held so dear, in this psychological thriller from Olivier Masset-Depass.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7377132/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"TheDragonTrader","dateCreated":"2021-05-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"A slowly illuminating red light","reviewBody":"After a tragic accident shatters the friendly alliance between two neighbours, they start harassing each other to find out who really was responsible for what happened. While the audience at first thinks it was a perfectly banal accident, their doubt is being fuelled scene after scene...

Veerle Baetens' en Anne Coessens' performances are filled with subtle mistrust and held-back anger. These two characters playing off each other are a true feast for the spectators. Also the young Jules Lefebre acts with a maturity beyond his years. The cinematography by Hichame Alaouie is effective and - even though the pace at times threatens to slow down a bit too much - keeps every scene interesting and fresh: playing with angles, lighting and other effects to signify the slow descent into madness. Olivier Masset-Depasses' direction is clean, whilst never sinking into blandness.

However, the omnipresent score is overblown and lacks subtlety, but regularly does capture the right atmosphere for the scene. The story after a while threatens to loose its own point, but regains its footing again in the finale. And what a chilling finale that was! One last nit-picking comment can be that the film could have raised uncertainty and suspicion even more than it in fact did.

Finally, one cannot ignore the not-so-subtle hints to Hitchcock's work in the production design, costumes and building of tension. It's expertly done and - in my humble opinion - this movie is perfectly capable of standing between great names such as 'Rear Window' and 'The Man Who Knew Too Much'. A shame it only came out in 2018, because back in the 60's, it would have perplexed it's audiences. programme.desc: Maja (Selena Marsenic), sześcioletnia Serbka, przeprowadza się wraz z rodzicami do Danii. Jest nieco onieśmielona i wiele elementów codziennego dnia jest dla niej niezrozumiałych. Szczególnie utrudniona jest jej relacja z innymi dziećmi.

programme.title: Ewolucja Jackiego Chana
programme.desc: Kulisy spektakularnej kariery Jackiego Chana. Tego znanego artystę można nazwać człowiekiem instytucją. Oprócz tego że jest cenionym aktorem, pracuje także jako kaskader, scenarzysta i reżyser, a także biznesmen. Jak nikt inny w branży filmowej potrafi widowiskowo łączyć azjatyckie kino sztuk walki z chaplinowskim humorem oraz hollywoodzkim rozmachem.

programme.title: Fågelfångarens Son
W pułapce myśliwego
The Birdcatcher
programme.desc: Fågelfångarens Son: Directed by Richard Hobert. With Rudi Køhnke, Vígdis Eliesersdóttir Hentze Bjørck, Livia Millhagen, Hedda Rehnberg. Plot Summary It's the late 1800's and the birdcatcher Esmar and his wife Johanna are trying to survive on the harsh dramatic cliffs of the Faroe Islands. Local law dictates that unless they have a son, an heir to the hold on their land, they will be evicted. When Johanna gives birth to their third daughter, with time on the lease running out, they become desperate. A friend, innkeeper Livia, suggests that the only way for Johanna to have a son might be to be impregnated by another man. It's unthinkable, but they are pushed to the brink. With Rudi Køhnke, Vígdis Eliesersdóttir Hentze Bjørck, Livia Millhagen, Hedda Rehnberg. Plot Summary It's the late 1800's and the birdcatcher Esmar and his wife Johanna are trying to survive on the harsh dramatic cliffs of the Faroe Islands. Local law dictates that unless they have a son, an heir to the hold on their land, they will be evicted. When Johanna gives birth to their third daughter, with time on the lease running out, they become desperate. A friend, innkeeper Livia, suggests that the only way for Johanna to have a son might be to be impregnated by another man. It's unthinkable, but they are pushed to the brink. When they employ Livia's lover, the "French Captain" to do the deed, none of. them can understand the ultimate consequences of their choices." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7552784/","name":"Fågelfångarens Son","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmNiN2MzMDgtMWYyNy00NmNmLWFhYzQtNzFlYzgwMzRhMTUzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzAzMTAyNjU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Plot Summary It's the late 1800's and the birdcatcher Esmar and his wife Johanna are trying to survive on the harsh dramatic cliffs of the Faroe Islands. programme.title: Swing Vote
Najważniejszy głos
Swing Vote
programme.desc:
Swing Vote: Directed by Joshua Michael Stern. With Kevin Costner, Madeline Carroll, Paula Patton, Kelsey Grammer. In a remarkable turn-of-events, the result of the presidential election comes down to one man's vote." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1027862/","name":"Swing Vote","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAwMTQyNzkwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTgyMzE3MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a remarkable turn-of-events, the result of the presidential election comes down to one man's vote.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1027862/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MLDinTN"},"dateCreated":"2009-08-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"entertaining although not plausible","reviewBody":"Kevin Costner was actually in another decent movie. His last movie I saw, Mr. Brooks, was pretty good also. I would call this movie a political satire, that tries to be a little funny at times. However, the idea that one guy determines the presidential election is absurd, but if you can get past that, then the plot is OK. It was funny how the movie had the political parties doing adds for things they oppose. Example, the democrats supporting pro life because Bud says he's pro life.

The plot is struggling, every day man, Bud Johnson, just got laid off. He has a very smart daughter and she cares about the presidential election. Bud promises to vote since Molly thinks it's important. But, when he doesn't show, Molly votes in his place but the power goes out and the vote didn't count. The election comes down to New Mexico and for some reason, not told in the movie, Bud's vote will decide the electoral votes. I mean, how could the votes be even for each side and even if they were very close, how many months would it take for all the recounts that would take place. But any way, it's up to Bud, whom doesn't care about politics. He becomes an instant celebrity and is courted by both candidates. By the end of the film, Bud grows an appreciation for the political scene and realizes that it is important to care about social issues.

FINAL VERDICT: Funnier than I thought and provides a message. Plus, the movie doesn't try to say that one party is better than the other.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":18365,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2008-08-01","keywords":"awakened by one's daughter,father daughter relationship,presidential candidate,election returns,election coverage","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Swing Vote","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2363687193","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEwMDM1OTc1NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA0MDczMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEwMDM1OTc1NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA0MDczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Swing Vote Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000126/","name":"Kevin Costner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1745736/","name":"Paula Patton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001288/","name":"Kelsey Grammer"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0827750/","name":"Joshua Michael Stern"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049348/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023815/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0237137/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0725034/","name":"Jason Richman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0827750/","name":"Joshua Michael Stern"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1250389/","name":"David Giammarco"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Lost Son
Zaginiony syn
The Lost Son
programme.desc:
The Lost Son: Directed by Chris Menges. With Daniel Auteuil, Nastassja Kinski, Katrin Cartlidge, Marianne Denicourt. Xavier Lombard is a world-weary private eye in London, in exile from his native Paris; his best friend is Nathalie, a high-class call girl. He gets a call from an old friend from the Paris police department, now a businessman whose brother-in-law is missing. The missing man's parents hire Xavier over their daughter's objections, and quickly he finds himself in the realm of children's sexual slavery. He guesses that the lost son is dead and shifts his focus to finding and breaking this lucrative business of child trafficking. He involves a reluctant Nathalie to hunt "the Austrian," the shadowy head of the business. Violence erupts quickly, and Xavier soon has little more to lose." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0144286/","name":"The Lost Son","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzE5MjE2ODUwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODgwNjcxMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Xavier Lombard is a world-weary private eye in London, in exile from his native Paris; his best friend is Nathalie, a high-class call girl. He gets a call from an old friend from the Paris police department, now a businessman whose b","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0144286/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"angelwild18"},"dateCreated":"2007-04-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"An excellent "Flic" - French Cop-Style Thriller","reviewBody":"I just watched this film on DVD, and sought it out because I love Daniel Auteil's acting.

This film felt very French to me in its cinematography and overall styling, although largely London based, and shot mainly in English. 

The acting throughout was excellent, perhaps with the exception of Ciaran Hinds' Brazilian/American/Irish accent! Ciaran plays the lost son's brother in law, who brings Lombard, the French private detective living in London, in to try to solve the case of the disappearance.

The film does deal with a very sensitive subject, but I felt it did so sensitively, showing how an empire can be brought down by one man, if he feels strongly enough to sacrifice everything he has.

There are some very violent scenes, and they are wholly central to the script, highlighting how low Lombard's character, is brought by his passion and anger at what horrors he has uncovered in a paedophile ring, involved in the disappearance of the lost son. Lombard makes moral decisions throughout the film that are understandable and I feel that this is a very powerful film.

The late Katrin Cartlidge puts in a very strong performance, supporting Lombard's character in his ultimate revenge plot. Lombard's "tart with a heart" best friend, Marianne Denicourt, is excellent in a stunning bitter-sweet role, and Billie Whitelaw is fabulous as the stern, businesslike matriarch, whose lost son is being sought by Lombard, and who also comes to terms with tragic loss, as Lombard also must. Auteuil, as always, is credible, beautiful and gives a very moving performance. Although it took me a few minutes to get over his English "voice"!

In my opinion, this must be one of the best international, cross-over, thrillers in recent years.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1488,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"1999-04-21","keywords":"private investigator,pedophilia,boy,sexual abuse,child prostitution","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000809/","name":"Daniel Auteuil"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000176/","name":"Nastassja Kinski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001020/","name":"Katrin Cartlidge"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0579580/","name":"Chris Menges"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103757/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103532/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0496226/","name":"Eric Leclere"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112127/","name":"Margaret Leclere"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0590105/","name":"Mark Mills"}],"duration":"PT1H42M"}</script><metacontent="

Xavier Lombard is a world-weary private eye in London, in exile from his native Paris; his best friend is Nathalie, a high-class call girl. He gets a call from an old friend from the Paris police department, now a businessman whose brother-in-law is missing. The missing man's parents hire Xavier over their daughter's objections, and quickly he finds himself in the realm of children's sexual slavery. He guesses that the lost son is dead and shifts his focus to finding and breaking this lucrative business of child trafficking. He involves a reluctant Nathalie to hunt "the Austrian," the shadowy head of the business. Violence erupts quickly, and Xavier soon has little more to lose." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0144286/","name":"The Lost Son","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzE5MjE2ODUwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODgwNjcxMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Xavier Lombard is a world-weary private eye in London, in exile from his native Paris; his best friend is Nathalie, a high-class call girl. He gets a call from an old friend from the Paris police department, now a businessman whose b","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0144286/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"angelwild18","dateCreated":"2007-04-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"An excellent "Flic" - French Cop-Style Thriller","reviewBody":"I just watched this film on DVD, and sought it out because I love Daniel Auteil's acting.

This film felt very French to me in its cinematography and overall styling, although largely London based, and shot mainly in English. 

The acting throughout was excellent, perhaps with the exception of Ciaran Hinds' Brazilian/American/Irish accent! Ciaran plays the lost son's brother in law, who brings Lombard, the French private detective living in London, in to try to solve the case of the disappearance.

The film does deal with a very sensitive subject, but I felt it did so sensitively, showing how an empire can be brought down by one man, if he feels strongly enough to sacrifice everything he has.

There are some very violent scenes, and they are wholly central to the script, highlighting how low Lombard's character, is brought by his passion and anger at what horrors he has uncovered in a paedophile ring, involved in the disappearance of the lost son. Lombard makes moral decisions throughout the film that are understandable and I feel that this is a very powerful film.

The late Katrin Cartlidge puts in a very strong performance, supporting Lombard's character in his ultimate revenge plot. Lombard's "tart with a heart" best friend, Marianne Denicourt, is excellent in a stunning bitter-sweet role, and Billie Whitelaw is fabulous as the stern, businesslike matriarch, whose lost son is being sought by Lombard, and who also comes to terms with tragic loss, as Lombard also must. Auteuil, as always, is credible, beautiful and gives a very moving performance. Although it took me a few minutes to get over his English "voice"!

In my opinion, this must be one of the best international, cross-over, thrillers in recent years.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1488,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"1999-04-21","keywords":"private investigator,pedophilia,boy,sexual abuse,child prostitution","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000809/","name":"Daniel Auteuil","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000176/","name":"Nastassja Kinski","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001020/","name":"Katrin Cartlidge"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0579580/","name":"Chris Menges"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103757/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103532/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0496226/","name":"Eric Leclere","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112127/","name":"Margaret Leclere","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0590105/","name":"Mark Mills"],"duration":"PT1H42M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Dark Stranger
The Dark Stranger
programme.desc:
The Dark Stranger: Directed by Chris Trebilcock. With Katie Findlay, Alex Ozerov, Enrico Colantoni, Stephen McHattie. Haunted by a terrifying spirit out of her graphic novel, a young artist struggles to overcome her psychosis before it destroys her." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3653650/","name":"The Dark Stranger","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTJmMTg1ZTAtMTE0YS00MzQ4LWI0ZmQtYjVjYjVlY2U3MWI2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjAzODAxNTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Haunted by a terrifying spirit out of her graphic novel, a young artist struggles to overcome her psychosis before it destroys her.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3653650/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TheLittleSongbird"},"dateCreated":"2018-05-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not dark enough","reviewBody":"'The Dark Stranger' drew me into seeing it, with a cool poster/cover, an intriguing and quite creative premise and as someone with a general appreciation for horror. That it was low-budget, which from frequent personal experience is rarely a good sign due to that there are so many poor ones out there, made me though apprehensive. 

It is sadly however yet another film seen recently, hence some reiteration because the exact same strengths and flaws are here present in those films, that to me was quite disappointing considering its potential which it doesn't do enough with. 'The Dark Stranger' is not great, or good, has a fair share of problems (fairly big ones too) and doesn't do enough with its potential, which was hardly small. There are however a few decent, even good, qualities in 'The Dark Stranger'.

Lets start with the positives. The scenery is atmospheric, likewise with the decent way it's shot. The music is suitably spooky and quirky and doesn't distract at all from the atmosphere, while not exactly enhancing it. 

A few unsettling moments and horror tropes and the acting is better than average.

However, the story does feel over-stretched and some of it feels vague, under-explained in the last third where the film especially became duller, more predictable, more senseless and less scary it got. Too many characters are too sketchy and with nowhere near enough to make one want to endear to them. Their irritating and illogical decision making and behaviours frustrates. Making the film feel bland and forgettable with not enough heart put into it. The effects are ropy at best.

Dialogue can be stilted and rambling while the pace is uneven, dragging in a lot of the second half and never is it exciting. Found too many the supposedly shocking moments not surprising or scary and the supposedly creepy atmosphere dreary, due to the excessive obviousness and the lack of tension and suspense. A lot of the film has underdeveloped plot elements and often nonsensical and confusing character motivations. There is very little threat here and what there is of it is used poorly, while the psychological elements are unimaginative and are more odd than scary. Some badly sagging momentum too. The direction is pretty leaden.

Overall, not a terrible film by any stretch but should have been darker and scarier. 4/10 Bethany Cox","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":654,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.5},"genre":["Animation","Drama","Horror"],"datePublished":"2015-07-15","keywords":"artist","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"THE DARK STRANGER Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4049516057","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzExZjIzYjItYjc1Yy00ZjY3LTg1MDctMjk4ODNmY2UwM2FjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTcwMzkyNDE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzExZjIzYjItYjc1Yy00ZjY3LTg1MDctMjk4ODNmY2UwM2FjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTcwMzkyNDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official trailer for THE DARK STRANGER"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3818748/","name":"Katie Findlay"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4495030/","name":"Alex Ozerov"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0170186/","name":"Enrico Colantoni"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1196726/","name":"Chris Trebilcock"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013720/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0180560/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0317152/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1196726/","name":"Chris Trebilcock"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
Lavalantula: Directed by Mike Mendez. With Steve Guttenberg, Nia Peeples, Patrick Renna, Carlos Bernard. Volcanic eruptions in Los Angeles unleash a swarm of gigantic, lava-breathing tarantulas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4060576/","name":"Lavalantula","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEzMTY5OTEzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzgwODM2NTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Volcanic eruptions in Los Angeles unleash a swarm of gigantic, lava-breathing tarantulas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4060576/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sj_stewart"},"dateCreated":"2016-03-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Ludicrous and idiotic but extremely entertaining","reviewBody":"This hilariously idiotic sci-fi horror TV movie from the SyFy channel, in which giant lava-breathing tarantulas are released upon Los Angeles by violent volcanic eruptions, is as completely ludicrous as it sounds.

Despite the obvious plot holes, errors, bad CGI and its lack of scientific accuracy, Lavalantula's typical separated family gets reunited in time to save the day style story, is both extremely entertaining and exceedingly scary for all those suffering from arachnophobia.

The film stars Steve Guttenberg from Police Academy and Short Circuit, as well as Nia Peeples from Pretty Little Liars. 

For more reviews like this please visit: www.scifikingdom.co.uk","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3004,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2015-07-25","keywords":"giant spider,family man,tremor,shaker,shotgun","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Lavalantula","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4037653017","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGJlMjMwOTYtMTJmMi00NjQ3LTk0ZmQtM2I5YmEzYTU4YzFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGJlMjMwOTYtMTJmMi00NjQ3LTk0ZmQtM2I5YmEzYTU4YzFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Lavalantula"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000430/","name":"Steve Guttenberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001604/","name":"Nia Peeples"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0719606/","name":"Patrick Renna"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0579079/","name":"Mike Mendez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0282285/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1140089/","name":"Neil Elman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0579079/","name":"Mike Mendez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4639862/","name":"Ashley O'Neil"}],"duration":"PT1H23M"}</script><metacontent="

Volcanic eruptions in Los Angeles unleash a swarm of gigantic, lava-breathing tarantulas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4060576/","name":"Lavalantula","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEzMTY5OTEzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzgwODM2NTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Volcanic eruptions in Los Angeles unleash a swarm of gigantic, lava-breathing tarantulas.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4060576/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"sj_stewart","dateCreated":"2016-03-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Ludicrous and idiotic but extremely entertaining","reviewBody":"This hilariously idiotic sci-fi horror TV movie from the SyFy channel, in which giant lava-breathing tarantulas are released upon Los Angeles by violent volcanic eruptions, is as completely ludicrous as it sounds.

Despite the obvious plot holes, errors, bad CGI and its lack of scientific accuracy, Lavalantula's typical separated family gets reunited in time to save the day style story, is both extremely entertaining and exceedingly scary for all those suffering from arachnophobia.

The film stars Steve Guttenberg from Police Academy and Short Circuit, as well as Nia Peeples from Pretty Little Liars. 

For more reviews like this please visit: www.scifikingdom.co.uk","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3004,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2015-07-25","keywords":"giant spider,family man,tremor,shaker,shotgun","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Lavalantula","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4037653017","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGJlMjMwOTYtMTJmMi00NjQ3LTk0ZmQtM2I5YmEzYTU4YzFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGJlMjMwOTYtMTJmMi00NjQ3LTk0ZmQtM2I5YmEzYTU4YzFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Lavalantula","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000430/","name":"Steve Guttenberg","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001604/","name":"Nia Peeples","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0719606/","name":"Patrick Renna"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0579079/","name":"Mike Mendez"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017447/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0282285/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1140089/","name":"Neil Elman","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0579079/","name":"Mike Mendez","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4639862/","name":"Ashley O'Neil"],"duration":"PT1H23M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Lone Rider
Samotny jeździec
Lone Rider
programme.desc:
Lone Rider: Directed by David S. Cass Sr.. With Lou Diamond Phillips, Stacy Keach, Vincent Spano, Marta DuBois. With heartening family drama and adrenaline-pumping action, Lone Rider is a western with guts, glory, and a powerful message. Bob Hattaway, an honored soldier, returns to his Western hometown to discover that corrupt landowner Stu Croaker has become the most powerful man in the county. What Stu wants next is the Hattaway family business. And normally, what he wants, he gets. But when his strong-arm tactics turn deadly, Bob fights back with a vengeance. This is the West and it s going to get wild. Featuring an all-star cast including Lou Diamond Phillips, Vincent Spano, and Stacy Keach." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1092014/","name":"Lone Rider","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2ZlYTg3N2ItOGVkZC00OWEzLWE2YzktZDZkYWY4NWZmNDY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTM3MDMyMDQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"With heartening family drama and adrenaline-pumping action, Lone Rider is a western with guts, glory, and a powerful message. Bob Hattaway, an honored soldier, returns to his Western hometown to discover that corrupt landowner Stu Cr","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1092014/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bkoganbing"},"dateCreated":"2008-04-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Bares Resemblance To Anthony Mann/James Stewart Westerns","reviewBody":"In Lone Rider Lou Diamond Phillips returns to his small Texas town after war service and looks to settle down with his family. When he left there before the Civil War his parents and cousin had a prosperous ranch and a mercantile in town.

But while he's been away, a boyhood friend has become the town boss and is looking to take over the ranch and the mercantile. Lou's father Stacy Keach has borrowed for the store with a loan on the ranch which boyhood friend Vincent Spano wants paid in full.

Spano's moving on a few fronts in that town and in the tradition of many westerns the town looks for a champion and Lou fills the bill.

Lone Rider reminds me a whole lot of some of the Anthony Mann/James Stewart westerns of the Fifties. Phillips is playing a part that half a century ago Jimmy Stewart would have been playing. In fact there are distinct plot elements from The Far Country and Bend of the River in Lone Rider.

And fifty years ago Lone Rider would have been released on the big screen when westerns had more of a market and would have been acclaimed and enjoyed.

But for western fans like your's truly, we still enjoy them.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":442,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Western"],"datePublished":"2008-04-12","keywords":"family business,landowner,two word title","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001617/","name":"Lou Diamond Phillips"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005078/","name":"Stacy Keach"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001759/","name":"Vincent Spano"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003180/","name":"David S. Cass Sr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209513/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0789041/","name":"Frank Sharp"}],"duration":"PT1H24M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Aces 'N' Eights
Zabójcza rozgrywka
Aces 'N Eights
programme.desc:
Aces 'N' Eights: Directed by Craig R. Baxley. With Casper Van Dien, Bruce Boxleitner, Ernest Borgnine, Jeff Kober. Already taking a gamble settling in the uncharted west, the peaceful settlers of a town destined for railroad greatness suddenly find themselves being ruthlessly gunned down. With no law and order to be found, justice falls onto the shoulders of an elderly rancher and an accomplished, but retired, gunslinger." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1087828/","name":"Aces 'N' Eights","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkwMzAyNjQxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzE2MTIzMg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Already taking a gamble settling in the uncharted west, the peaceful settlers of a town destined for railroad greatness suddenly find themselves being ruthlessly gunned down. With no law and order to be found, justice falls onto the ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1087828/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bkoganbing"},"dateCreated":"2013-08-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just a right of way,","reviewBody":"Casper Van Dien stars in Aces 'N' Eights as a former gunslinger in Jeff Kober's band of thugs for hire who up and quits and decides to settle down and lead a peaceful life. Rancher Ernest Borgnine takes him in and life goes well.

That is until Kober's murderous band gets hired by William Atherton of the railroad and he wants a lot of ranches cleared out. And Kober is a man who enjoys killing to make that happen.

I have to say this was a strange western for someone who's seen more than his share. Most of the time if the plot involved the railroad coming through it was a good thing and it was bad guys who had insider knowledge of that happening trying to push people off their land. In some cases it was the railroad, most famously in the Tyrone Power classic Jesse James that was strong arming people off their property, but just killing them? After all, the railroad just wants a right of way, enough room to lay down their tracks.

Which made this western a rather dubious proposition for me. Still there's enough action to satisfy any western fan. There's also an adroit performance Bruce Boxleitner as one of Kober's men who plays a distinctly lone hand.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":741,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2008-03-15","keywords":"rancher,railroad,main character shot,torture,opening action scene","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Aces 'N Eights","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi179634457","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjI5MzYwODYtZGJkMi00NGQ3LWI3NTAtZTJmNjc0ZDlhOTYxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjI5MzYwODYtZGJkMi00NGQ3LWI3NTAtZTJmNjc0ZDlhOTYxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Grand Army"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000680/","name":"Casper Van Dien"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000310/","name":"Bruce Boxleitner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000308/","name":"Ernest Borgnine"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0062644/","name":"Craig R. programme.title: Devil in a Blue Dress
W bagnie Los Angeles
Devil in a Blue Dress
programme.desc: Devil in a Blue Dress: Directed by Carl Franklin. With Denzel Washington, Tom Sizemore, Jennifer Beals, Don Cheadle. An African-American man is hired to find a woman, and gets mixed up in a murderous political scandal." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0112857/","name":"Devil in a Blue Dress","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjI3NjFiNmMtMmQ1ZC00OTUwLWJlMWMtM2UxY2M2NDQ0OWJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTI4MjkwNjA@._V1_.jpg","description":"An African-American man is hired to find a woman, and gets mixed up in a murderous political scandal.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0112857/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dfranzen70"},"dateCreated":"2000-02-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Dazzling atmosphere, Washington make this a winner","reviewBody":"Denzel Washington plays Easy Rawlins, a down-on-his-luck sometime machinist, sometime detective in late-1940's L.A. Seems someone wants him to find a mysterious white lady in a blue dress (Jennifer Beals)who's thought to have been seen in a blacks-only club. Enter Easy, who with his connections can get into the club and find the girl. But, of course, there's more to this plot than just that, or else it'd be a mighty short film.\n\n The atmosphere is a major asset here; director Carl Franklin has done a magnificent job not only of recreating the Los Angeles of the late forties but also of showing the story from the black perspective, a rarity in film. All the sights and sounds are there, and if you concentrate real hard you can even detect the smells, too. Washington's aces, of course, as usual; makes you wonder if he'll do any more adaptations of Walter Mosley books starring Easy Rawlins. He's aided by a very good supporting cast, including Beals and Tom Sizemore (playing a heavy, surprise surprise!). Fans of Washington should watch this, but really anyone who likes film noir will approve.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":19355,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"1995-09-29","keywords":"african american,jazz club,private detective,missing person,jazz music","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Devil in a Blue Dress","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi966918425","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGRlYTI0ZTktNzc0OC00NjMyLTkwODgtNTQ5YmY5YzFlZGY1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGRlYTI0ZTktNzc0OC00NjMyLTkwODgtNTQ5YmY5YzFlZGY1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Columbia Tristar"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000243/","name":"Denzel Washington"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001744/","name":"Tom Sizemore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000884/","name":"Jennifer Beals"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002083/","name":"Carl Franklin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005883/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093046/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043058/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0608859/","name":"Walter Mosley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002083/","name":"Carl Franklin"}],"duration":"PT1H42M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0112857, Title: Devil in a Blue Dress, --- Description: Devil in a Blue Dress: Directed by Carl Franklin. With Denzel Washington, Tom Sizemore, Jennifer Beals, Don Cheadle. An African-American man is hired to find a woman, and gets mixed up in a murderous political scandal." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0112857/","name":"Devil in a Blue Dress","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjI3NjFiNmMtMmQ1ZC00OTUwLWJlMWMtM2UxY2M2NDQ0OWJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTI4MjkwNjA@._V1_.jpg","description":"An African-American man is hired to find a woman, and gets mixed up in a murderous political scandal.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0112857/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"dfranzen70","dateCreated":"2000-02-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Dazzling atmosphere, Washington make this a winner","reviewBody":"Denzel Washington plays Easy Rawlins, a down-on-his-luck sometime machinist, sometime detective in late-1940's L.A. Seems someone wants him to find a mysterious white lady in a blue dress (Jennifer Beals)who's thought to have been seen in a blacks-only club. Enter Easy, who with his connections can get into the club and find the girl. But, of course, there's more to this plot than just that, or else it'd be a mighty short film.\n\n The atmosphere is a major asset here; director Carl Franklin has done a magnificent job not only of recreating the Los Angeles of the late forties but also of showing the story from the black perspective, a rarity in film. All the sights and sounds are there, and if you concentrate real hard you can even detect the smells, too. Washington's aces, of course, as usual; makes you wonder if he'll do any more adaptations of Walter Mosley books starring Easy Rawlins. He's aided by a very good supporting cast, including Beals and Tom Sizemore (playing a heavy, surprise surprise!). Fans of Washington should watch this, but really anyone who likes film noir will approve.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":19355,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"1995-09-29","keywords":"african american,jazz club,private detective,missing person,jazz music","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Devil in a Blue Dress","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi966918425","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGRlYTI0ZTktNzc0OC00NjMyLTkwODgtNTQ5YmY5YzFlZGY1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGRlYTI0ZTktNzc0OC00NjMyLTkwODgtNTQ5YmY5YzFlZGY1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Columbia Tristar","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000243/","name":"Denzel Washington","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001744/","name":"Tom Sizemore","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000884/","name":"Jennifer Beals"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002083/","name":"Carl Franklin"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005883/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093046/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043058/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0608859/","name":"Walter Mosley","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002083/","name":"Carl Franklin"],"duration":"PT1H42M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Single White Female
Sublokatorka
Single White Female
programme.desc:
Single White Female: Directed by Barbet Schroeder. With Bridget Fonda, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Steven Weber, Peter Friedman. A woman advertising for a new roommate finds that something very strange is going on with the tenant who decides to move in." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0105414/","name":"Single White Female","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjNmMTNjYzEtNGIzOC00ZDc2LWFjN2UtZTNmZjgxZDJkNzBlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjQ2MjQ5NzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A woman advertising for a new roommate finds that something very strange is going on with the tenant who decides to move in.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0105414/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"hitchcockthelegend"},"dateCreated":"2011-08-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Who needs references these days anyway?","reviewBody":"Single White Female is directed by Barbet Schroeder and adapted to screenplay by Don Roos from the novel "SWF Seeks Same" written by John Lutz. It stars Bridget Fonda, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Steven Weber, Peter Friedman and Stephen Tobolowsky. Music is by Howard Shore and cinematography by Luciano Tovoli.

When it's revealed that her partner Sam (Weber) has been cheating on her with his ex-wife, Allie Jones (Fonda) kicks him out of the apartment and advertises for a female roommate. She chooses Hedra Carlson (Leigh), who on the surface seems to be the perfect roommate. Smoothly helping Allie through her crisis, a real friendship is formed, but it's not long before Hedra starts to exhibit some dark behaviour patterns ..

The early 90s saw the "Woman from Hell" back in vogue in mainstream cinema. After the success and publicity of Fatal Attraction (1987), there was a period where you feel that sensible film makers wisely chose to let that particular film disappear from the film lovers memory banks. As it happens, they must have collectively chose 5 years as the cooling off period. For 1992 saw a wave of mad female on the loose pictures released. Led by the publicity gobbling Basic Instinct, films such as The Hand That Rocks the Cradle and Single White Female put bums on cinema seats and reopened the "Mad Bitch" sub-genre. Of the three, Single White Female grossed the least, which is strange since it's a better movie than the other two.

Schroeder's (Barfly/Reversal of Fortune) movie isn't a complete success, there's not enough development of the main characters and there's some unintentionally funny moments. But when it's good it's real good. Reeling off a number of memorable and often chilling scenes, film is further boosted by the psychological smarts in Roos' (Boys on the Side) screenplay. It helps that Schroeder has a knack for pacing, too, where he neatly simmers the plot until the spill over for the big finale. No disappointment there either, a good combination of genre staples is enhanced in impact by some unexpected character developments, and there's moments of genuine suspense to lure the viewer to the edge of their seat. 

It's also stylishly shot by Schroeder and Tovoli (Suspiria/Tenebrae). Allie's Upper West Side apartment is imposing and expansive, with high ceilings, old time plumbing, a clunky lift and a dingy laundry in the basement. It's a different set-up for such a thriller, no picket fence harmony house or beach side residence, this is bustling New York, big spaces, but as it turns out, that means no hiding place. The boys behind the cameras get the maximum they can from the locale by blending imposing and ominous with grainy veneer and filtered light. On the acting front, the girls put great effort into making their thinly developed characters work, with Leigh doing a good line in progressive instability. While Friedman, Weber and a wonderfully naughty Tobolowsky, make the most of their secondary roles. 

One or two obvious flaws aside, this still rounds out as a thoroughly enjoyable thriller. 7.5/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":35396,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1992-08-14","keywords":"female star appears nude,roommate,female nudity,bound and gagged,woman in bathtub","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2455550745","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2I0M2E4NTgtOWQ3ZC00ZGI2LWFlY2ItNjdhNTVjODBkZDE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2I0M2E4NTgtOWQ3ZC00ZGI2LWFlY2ItNjdhNTVjODBkZDE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000403/","name":"Bridget Fonda"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000492/","name":"Jennifer Jason Leigh"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001836/","name":"Steven Weber"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0775447/","name":"Barbet Schroeder"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1661375/","name":"John Lutz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0740400/","name":"Don Roos"}],"duration":"PT1H47M"}</script><metacontent="
