programme.title: Open Season 3
Sezon na misia 3
Open Season 3
programme.desc:
Open Season 3: Directed by Cody Cameron. With Matthew J. Munn, Nika Futterman, Maddie Taylor, André Sogliuzzo. Boog's friends rally to bring him home from a Russian traveling circus." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1646926/","name":"Open Season 3","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTlmZWUxZjctYmVmZS00MTNlLTllZmMtNGZiMjIzOWRlY2M0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjIzODI5OTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Boog's friends rally to bring him home from a Russian traveling circus.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1646926/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gavin6942"},"dateCreated":"2011-01-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Probably the Death of a Series","reviewBody":"Boog plans a guy's trip, but all his friends back out for one reason or another. He goes alone and stumbles on to a circus and a beautiful female bear named Ursa. Switching places with a male bear named Doug, his friends in the forest soon become worried.

The reviews for this film are not stellar, and I think I can sum up why: the original voice cast is not involved in this picture, so the characters sound funny. The plot is thin, and the movie comes in under 90 minutes, letting you know that they didn't have a strong story (even including the dogs and cats seems forced because it is not related to the main story at all).

For me, I liked the film. I don't have a strong attachment to the original, so I wasn't as offended. And I think kids will like it. Sure, the voice for Boog was annoying... but then, I loved the dogs and cats, so it's a toss-up. I felt like this was going to be a launching pad for a TV series, because it has a "Madagascar" feel to it... but with its poor reception, that may not be likely.

If you have kids, let them check it out. They may be less cynical than adult viewers, and it's not all bad. I learned what a camelid is... that may be worth the price of renting the film. But then again, maybe not. My girlfriend watched it with me and fell asleep... what does that tell you?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":11099,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2011-01-25","keywords":"russian,circus,prince and pauper,look alike,role reversal","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Open Season 3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi205691161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ4NjExNjI0MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDg3MTczMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ4NjExNjI0MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDg3MTczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Boog's friends really to bring him home from a Russian traveling circus."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3103829/","name":"Matthew J. Munn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0296546/","name":"Nika Futterman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2407919/","name":"Maddie Taylor"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0970606/","name":"Cody Cameron"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0051162/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0121181/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0137811/","name":"John B. programme.desc: Surf's Up 2: WaveMania: Directed by Henry Yu. With Jeremy Shada, Jon Heder, Melissa Sturm, John Cena. An animated comedy that features WWE Superstars, providing their own voices while matching up against talking animals." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5513260/","name":"Surf's Up 2: WaveMania","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjJkNjM4ODUtNDJlYy00ZGI1LTk1OTctODc2OWJlNmM1YTM3L2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTM3MDMyMDQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"An animated comedy that features WWE Superstars, providing their own voices while matching up against talking animals.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5513260/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"deirdre-76313"},"dateCreated":"2018-12-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"A pathetic attempt","reviewBody":"As a huge fan of the first movie, this was the worst sequel I have ever seen. Main characters from the last movie weren't even there and the storyline was completely changed. The WWE character idea doesn't have anything to do with surfing. If it was just a movie on its own, unrelated to Surf's Up... ok, maybe? But do NOT call this Surf's Up. Plus, there was no actual surfing in it. The original movie didn't leave us needing another movie to finish the story because the story was already done. If you're a huge fan like me and needed to see Surf's Up 2, don't get your hopes up.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2041,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2017-01-17","keywords":"animal,quicksand,penguin,otter,sequel","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Surf's Up 2: WaveMania","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2436216345","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjJjODM0Y2UtOTBhMy00NzE0LTlhZmItNTMwNzc1MDJjZjk1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjJjODM0Y2UtOTBhMy00NzE0LTlhZmItNTMwNzc1MDJjZjk1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Surf's Up 2: WaveMania"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1660179/","name":"Jeremy Shada"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1417647/","name":"Jon Heder"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3596979/","name":"Melissa Sturm"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4401911/","name":"Henry Yu"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0157814/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0121181/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0242604/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2226110/","name":"Abdul Williams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0105169/","name":"Ash Brannon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0118333/","name":"Chris Buck"}],"duration":"PT1H24M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Money Monster
Zakładnik z Wall Street
Money Monster
programme.desc:
Money Monster: Directed by Jodie Foster. With George Clooney, Julia Roberts, Jack O'Connell, Dominic West. Financial TV host Lee Gates and his producer Patty are put in an extreme situation when an irate investor takes them and their crew as hostage." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2241351/","name":"Money Monster","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgzMjU1NDUwMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODg1NjY0ODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Financial TV host Lee Gates and his producer Patty are put in an extreme situation when an irate investor takes them and their crew as hostage.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2241351/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"samerabdallah"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Solid and engaging thriller with a timely topic","reviewBody":"This is one of few real time films -meaning the flow of events matches the duration of the film- that is quite successful in keeping the viewer's attention all along, and Jodie Foster is very efficient as a director presenting what seems initially a daunting technical subject (how a computer "glitch" causes an 800 Million Dollar loss to shareholders in a public traded company) as a dramatic thriller that never looses pace.

The cast is excellent, Julia Roberts as the ever conscious producer calculating how each camera angle is best to follow on the unfolding live drama, George Clooney in one of his finest roles as the careless theatrical advice giver of the money program who gradually comes to realize how damaging his show is to the masses (in one particular touching scene he is in the street in NY and sees on-lookers imitating his dance moves on the show, and he becomes aware of what a buffoon he is), and finally Jack O'Connel who is very convincing as the candid investor who really wants to know how "the system" works (casting him was an inspired choice, he is not a well-known actor so he adds more credibility to the character he plays, a simple man from the street who looses all his money in Wall Street). None of the main or even secondary characters in the film are one dimensional, they have their problems (like lonely dinners for some) and concerns and values, whether it is the camera man or the public relations lady officer reporting to the big CEO, or even the main police officers in charge, all are multi-dimensional characters and their human aspects are not ignored. 

Even though the film deals with a serious subject, an eye opener leading one to wonder about the real money monsters out there, it remains an excellent thriller with top class actors.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":98054,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2016-05-13","keywords":"fictional tv network,financial thriller,money,hostage,death","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3048191257","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5NTA3MjUyOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODg5MjA3NzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5NTA3MjUyOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODg5MjA3NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Lee Gates (George Clooney) is a bombastic TV personality whose popular financial network show has made him the money wiz of Wall Street. But after he hawks a high tech stock that mysteriously crashes, an irate investor (Jack O'Connell) takes Gates, his crew, and his ace producer Patty Fenn (Julia Roberts) hostage live on air. Unfolding in real time, Gates and Fenn must find a way to keep themselves alive while simultaneously uncovering the truth behind a tangle of big money lies."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000123/","name":"George Clooney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000210/","name":"Julia Roberts"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1925239/","name":"Jack O'Connell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000149/","name":"Jodie Foster"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005883/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0479739/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0184096/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1956691/","name":"Jamie Linden"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0223804/","name":"Alan DiFiore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0467942/","name":"Jim Kouf"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse: Directed by Bob Persichetti, Peter Ramsey, Rodney Rothman. With Shameik Moore, Jake Johnson, Hailee Steinfeld, Mahershala Ali. Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4633694/","name":"Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMwNDkxMTgzOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTkwNTQ3NjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4633694/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"vancewinstead"},"dateCreated":"2018-12-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Giving Infinity war a run for it's money","reviewBody":"This movie was absolutely incredible. From the animation, to the storytelling, to the characters this movie is completely one of a kind. It is easily the best looking animated movie of the year (no surprise there), but what really caught me off guard was the story they were able to tell in such a short amount of time. Each character has their own distinct personality and is given their own separate characterization without making the movie feel bloated. I knew I would end up liking this movie, but this movie has completely exceeded my expectations. If you enjoy superheros or animation you should 100% definitely watch it in a theater.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":442054,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.4},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Action","Adventure"],"datePublished":"2018-12-14","keywords":"teenage superhero,multiverse,wisecrack humor,posthumous cameo,interdimensional travel","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Now Playing","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1489877529","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmNmMjk4NGMtMWY1Mi00ZjM5LWIxNzMtNDg2YjUxYWRmNTNmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmNmMjk4NGMtMWY1Mi00ZjM5LWIxNzMtNDg2YjUxYWRmNTNmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4271336/","name":"Shameik Moore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2159926/","name":"Jake Johnson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2794962/","name":"Hailee Steinfeld"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2130108/","name":"Bob Persichetti"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0709056/","name":"Peter Ramsey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0745247/","name":"Rodney Rothman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026545/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047120/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0520488/","name":"Phil Lord"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0745247/","name":"Rodney Rothman"}],"duration":"PT1H57M"}</script><metacontent="

Venom
programme.desc:
Venom: Directed by Ruben Fleischer. With Tom Hardy, Michelle Williams, Riz Ahmed, Scott Haze. A failed reporter is bonded to an alien entity, one of many symbiotes who have invaded Earth. But the being takes a liking to Earth and decides to protect it." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1270797/","name":"Venom","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzAwNzUzNjY4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTQ5MzM0NjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A failed reporter is bonded to an alien entity, one of many symbiotes who have invaded Earth. But the being takes a liking to Earth and decides to protect it.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1270797/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"declan-98915"},"dateCreated":"2018-10-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"LOVED IT!","reviewBody":"First of all Iv just watched the movie a couple of hours ago and Iv just been reading a few reviews and I must have been watching a different movie to them cause I absolulty loved Venom!

I love the relationship between Eddie and Venom, they proper cracked me up with some of the things they said and the whole room was laughing at loads of moments throughout the movie. 

Coming out of this movie makes me want to have a symbiote latch onto me if it's anything like the film. I loved the movie from end to finish, it was a hilarious, fun filled action ride!

My only critic is I would have liked the finale to go on for a little longer but other than that I thought it was brilliant, I deffo reccomend everyone go see it.

DONT Listen to other people's reviews, go watch it for yourself then decide if u liked it or not, I loved it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":435549,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2018-10-05","keywords":"anti hero,marvel comics,superhero,alien,symbiote","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1186773529","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2VkZDBkNWEtNjk3Ny00YTM0LWI3NzctYTU0MWIxOTM5Mzg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2VkZDBkNWEtNjk3Ny00YTM0LWI3NzctYTU0MWIxOTM5Mzg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0362766/","name":"Tom Hardy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0931329/","name":"Michelle Williams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1981893/","name":"Riz Ahmed"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0281508/","name":"Ruben Fleischer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0180492/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047120/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0684374/","name":"Jeff Pinkner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003298/","name":"Scott Rosenberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0545150/","name":"Kelly Marcel"}],"duration":"PT1H52M"}</script><metacontent="

The spinoff series of Bad Boys films focuses on drug enforcement agent Sydney Burnett, now working for the Los Angeles Police Department." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7555294/","name":"L.A.'s Finest","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjVlMzZkMTYtYjFiYy00Njc4LTk2NmMtYmRhZjJmZjcxNDg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The spinoff series of Bad Boys films focuses on drug enforcement agent Sydney Burnett, now working for the Los Angeles Police Department.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7555294/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ladywriter56"},"dateCreated":"2019-06-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pretty good","reviewBody":"After reading all the negative reviews on this I'm wondering what exactly does today's audience want in a cop series? More sex, language, unreal car chases? Less plot and enough action sequences in one episode to give your brain an epileptic seizure? After getting hooked on fun, entertaining shows like The Good Cop and Battle Creek only to have them cancelled after one season, I give up trying to figure out today's viewers. No, LA's Finest isn't perfect (or totally realistic, but hey, what show is?). Yet it's pretty engaging. The story lines keep me coming back for more episodes and I think the acting is pretty good. programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 7555294, Title: L.A.'s Finest, --- Description: L.A.'s Finest: Created by Brandon Margolis, Brandon Sonnier. With Jessica Alba, Gabrielle Union, Duane Martin, Zach Gilford. The spinoff series of Bad Boys films focuses on drug enforcement agent Sydney Burnett, now working for the Los Angeles Police Department." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7555294/","name":"L.A.'s Finest","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjVlMzZkMTYtYjFiYy00Njc4LTk2NmMtYmRhZjJmZjcxNDg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The spinoff series of Bad Boys films focuses on drug enforcement agent Sydney Burnett, now working for the Los Angeles Police Department.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7555294/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ladywriter56","dateCreated":"2019-06-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pretty good","reviewBody":"After reading all the negative reviews on this I'm wondering what exactly does today's audience want in a cop series? More sex, language, unreal car chases? Less plot and enough action sequences in one episode to give your brain an epileptic seizure? After getting hooked on fun, entertaining shows like The Good Cop and Battle Creek only to have them cancelled after one season, I give up trying to figure out today's viewers. No, LA's Finest isn't perfect (or totally realistic, but hey, what show is?). Yet it's pretty engaging. The story lines keep me coming back for more episodes and I think the acting is pretty good. programme.title: Band Aid
Grupa wsparcia
Band Aid
programme.desc:
Band Aid: Directed by Zoe Lister-Jones. With Zoe Lister-Jones, Adam Pally, Susie Essman, Retta. A couple who can't stop fighting embark on a last-ditch effort to save their marriage: turning their fights into songs and starting a band." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5816374/","name":"Band Aid","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTczMzYzMjU3NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjUwMjEzMjI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A couple who can't stop fighting embark on a last-ditch effort to save their marriage: turning their fights into songs and starting a band.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5816374/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"austin0731"},"dateCreated":"2018-04-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"A feel-good comedy about relationships and the meaning of being with someone","reviewBody":"Band Aid is a musical comedy that starts off very light hearted, fun and quirky but ends up discussing genuine marital issues, what it means to be in a long term relationship with someone and getting over loss. All the while incorporating great, entertaining music. 

Starring Zoe Lister-Jones, Adam Pally and Ravi Patel the cast captures their respective characters very well, the two leads initially managing to capture the constant bickering of long married couples brilliantly in an almost too mundane but authentic way. While also managing the tenderness and genuinity of their relationship in several scenes that shows the love and care between the two. 

The film's first half is indeed quirky and fun as the characters from this band and begin singing about their arguments and what they hate about each other. There is a growing debate between the two as Pally's Ben considers himself a realistic and Lister-Jones' Anna is the 'dreamer' this conflict of characters drives most of the drama and conflict of the film but is also what ends up bringing them together towards the end of the film where the film takes a more serious turn discussing the ideas of meeting a middle ground and of compromise. 

Band Aid is a fun microcosmic view of human romantic relationships, a meditation of what it means to be with someone and issues of loss and the role of emotions. While also managing to discuss gender roles and the different ideologies that men as men hold and women as women hold, there is something very tender, soft but philosophical in the discussions of the film. Making Band aid a feel-good type watch that isn't taxing at all, a very easy watch.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5543,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2017-06-09","keywords":"husband wife relationship,rock band,garage band,guitar,drummer","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3432888601","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjcwNTU3MzEtMWNhNi00Nzk0LWIyZWEtNmIzNDBlZDUzZDMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjcwNTU3MzEtMWNhNi00Nzk0LWIyZWEtNmIzNDBlZDUzZDMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A couple who can't stop fighting decide to write songs and start a band in a last ditch move to save their relationship."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1830380/","name":"Zoe Lister-Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1269723/","name":"Adam Pally"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0035488/","name":"Fred Armisen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1830380/","name":"Zoe Lister-Jones"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0484440/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0555595/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1830380/","name":"Zoe Lister-Jones"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 2
Naznaczony: rozdział 2
Insidious: Chapter 2
programme.desc: Insidious: Chapter 2: Directed by James Wan. With Patrick Wilson, Rose Byrne, Barbara Hershey, Lin Shaye. The Lamberts believe that they have defeated the spirits that have haunted their family, but they soon discover that evil is not beaten so easily." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2226417/","name":"Insidious: Chapter 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg0OTA5ODIxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTUzNDg4OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Lamberts believe that they have defeated the spirits that have haunted their family, but they soon discover that evil is not beaten so easily.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2226417/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jaguiar313"},"dateCreated":"2013-09-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Insidious sequel is spooky fun.","reviewBody":"Insidious: Chapter 2 starts up almost right after the original Insidious ended with Josh (Patrick Wilson) and Renai (Rose Byrne) Lambert reunited with their son Dalton (Ty Simpkins) after his spirit was held prisoner by a demon in an afterlife dimension called 'The Further'. But, as we saw in the final frames, something else was now inhabiting Josh's body and it had strangled paranormal investigator Elise (Lin Shaye) to death. We pick up as the unsuspecting family, including older son Foster (Andrew Astor) and their infant daughter Kali, have moved in with Josh's mother Lorraine (Barbara Hershey) while police investigate Elise's mysterious death in their house. They are barely moved in when supernatural occurrences start to begin again with objects moving, spectral voices, apparitions appearing and dear old dad acting very strange. While Renai tries to deal with the fact that supernatural forces are still with them, Josh tries to convince her all is well and Lorraine decides to team up with Elise's former assistants paranormal investigators Specs (Leigh Whannell who also wrote the screenplay) and Tucker (Angus Sampson) along with one of the original investigators from Josh's childhood haunting, Carl (Steve Coulter) to get down to the bottom of these haunted hi-jinx once and for all. And that is all I will say about the story as, despite some familiar trappings, James Wan (The Conjuring) takes this installment in some clever directions and once again uses the familiar elements very well. We get to know the story behind the evil woman in black seen in the last film and even revisit The Further though, this time it is inventively linked to events in the first film. The pace is a bit slower and more methodical this time round but, since this film is a bit of a mystery as well as haunting, it takes it's time to let the story unfold and secrets be revealed. We still get some spooky scenes but, it is refreshingly mixed in with Lorraine and co's equally goose bump inducing investigation. And what they find is deviously fun. The film is not quite as lively as Insidious part one but, I liked the mystery element and the film earned points with me for using it's return to 'The Further' a bit more clever and less silly then last time. That is the point where the first film lost it's grip on me and here I like how it was done and was with this supernatural chiller up to the spooky end. Wan is a good director and he takes what could have been a ho-hum retread and makes it a fun follow-up. He gets good performances out of all his cast and while I found Patrick Wilson to be bland in both Insidious and The Conjuring, he gets a far more lively performance out of him here. He gets to ham it up a bit and it suits him. The film has some beautiful and creepy visuals, as is Wan's trademark, and Joseph Bishara's score adds some nice atmosphere too. So in conclusion, while the story elements are more familiar; we've seen some of it before and the pace a bit slower, Wan does give us a spooky mystery to add to the paranormal activity and makes much more clever use of his otherworldly 'Further'. He also gives us some clever answers to the questions left by his first Insidious and that all adds up to a spooky fun time at the movies. Also stars House Of The Devil's Joceline Donahue as young Lorraine in some equally clever flashback sequences that tie into the rest of the film in a fun way."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":164356,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Horror","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2013-09-13","keywords":"police detective,barricading a door,injection in leg,taser,attacked with a knife","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"UK Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4286163225","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA2ODQzODA0OTZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDU4NjU4MTAx._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA2ODQzODA0OTZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDU4NjU4MTAx._V1_.jpg","description":"A haunted family struggles to uncover a terrifying secret that has left them dangerously connected to the spirit world in Insidious: Chapter 2."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933940/","name":"Patrick Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0126284/","name":"Rose Byrne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001347/","name":"Barbara Hershey"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1490123/","name":"James Wan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0314851/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0222021/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0051618/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1191481/","name":"Leigh Whannell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1490123/","name":"James Wan"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

credits.actor: Patrick Wilson, Rose Byrne, Ty Simpkins, Lin Shaye, Barbara Hershey, Steve Coulter, Leigh Whannell, Angus Sampson, Andrew Astor

programme.category: Horror, Mystery, Thriller, Horror, Mystery, Thriller
programme.review: --- Actors: Patrick Wilson (role=Josh Lambert), Rose Byrne (role=Renai Lambert), Barbara Hershey (role=Lorraine Lambert), Lin Shaye (role=Elise Rainier), Ty Simpkins (role=Dalton Lambert), Steve Coulter (role=Carl), Leigh Whannell (role=Specs), Angus Sampson (role=Tucker), Andrew Astor (role=Foster Lambert), Hank Harris (role=Young Carl), Jocelin Donahue (role=Young Lorraine), Lindsay Seim (role=Young Elise Rainier)

That is the point where the first film lost it's grip on me and here I like how it was done and was with this supernatural chiller up to the spooky end. Wan is a good director and he takes what could have been a ho-hum retread and makes it a fun follow-up. He gets good performances out of all his cast and while I found Patrick Wilson to be bland in both Insidious and The Conjuring, he gets a far more lively performance out of him here. He gets to ham it up a bit and it suits him. The film has some beautiful and creepy visuals, as is Wan's trademark, and Joseph Bishara's score adds some nice atmosphere too. So in conclusion, while the story elements are more familiar; we've seen some of it before and the pace a bit slower, Wan does give us a spooky mystery to add to the paranormal activity and makes much more clever use of his otherworldly 'Further'. He also gives us some clever answers to the questions left by his first Insidious and that all adds up to a spooky fun time at the movies. Also stars House Of The Devil's Joceline Donahue as young Lorraine in some equally clever flashback sequences that tie into the rest of the film in a fun way.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":164356,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Horror","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2013-09-13","keywords":"police detective,barricading a door,injection in leg,taser,attacked with a knife","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"UK Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4286163225","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA2ODQzODA0OTZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDU4NjU4MTAx._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA2ODQzODA0OTZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDU4NjU4MTAx._V1_.jpg","description":"A haunted family struggles to uncover a terrifying secret that has left them dangerously connected to the spirit world in Insidious: Chapter 2.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933940/","name":"Patrick Wilson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0126284/","name":"Rose Byrne","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001347/","name":"Barbara Hershey"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1490123/","name":"James Wan"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0314851/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0222021/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0051618/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1191481/","name":"Leigh Whannell","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1490123/","name":"James Wan"],"duration":"PT1H46M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Small Apartments
Sekrety małych mieszkań
Small Apartments
programme.desc:
Small Apartments: Directed by Jonas Åkerlund. With Matt Lucas, James Caan, Nugget, Juno Temple. A man is surrounded by strange events and odd neighbors in this adaptation of Chris Millis' novel." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1272886/","name":"Small Apartments","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzg3NDIwNjk5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDMxMzY0OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man is surrounded by strange events and odd neighbors in this adaptation of Chris Millis' novel.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1272886/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"harveer_chauhan"},"dateCreated":"2013-03-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Small apartments and apparently smaller lives but not so small a lesson!","reviewBody":"This movie is weird and disturbing movie when it starts but by the end it proves true to the purpose it is intended to have. The lives of the residents of an apartment building change when the owner is accidentally killed by one of the inhabitant. It take a while to get the hang of the pulse of the movie and it requires a lot of patience. The main protagonist is a loner and a voyeur who misses his ill(mentally) brother from whom he gets his taped messages. Meanwhile he is trying to dispose off the dead body of the owner. 

You do not fall in love with its characters or empathize with them but it definitely scares you to see their lives and you pray not to end up like them. But there are few moments when you feel sad for the people portrayed who are stuck in their little world and have distant hopes of escape from it. This movie forces you to confront or at least acknowledge the alienation,apathy,and surrender of some in the modern society who live on it fringe with little expectation of any worthwhile impact on anyone's life other than their own. But still it leaves you with a nice little message about forgiveness , family and the meaning of a well lived life.

You are not going to remember this movie for long but it's decently directed eerie movie for a select few who are patient enough to take a lesson home.

PS: Watch at your own risk.Either you will hate it or you will applaud the efforts for such a real depiction of lives in small apartments!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7657,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"keywords":"punched in the stomach,scene of the crime,fellatio,landlord,talking to oneself in a mirror","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1273603865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI5Mzc5NzM2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTMyMTEzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI5Mzc5NzM2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTMyMTEzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Franklin Franklin plays the alphorn and dreams of Switzerland. His crazy brother sends him fingernail clippings in the mail. One of his neighbors is a forgetful pot-head, the other a gruff busybody who doesn't miss anything. Across the street live a mother and her fifteen-year-old daughter, whom he likes to watch from his window, but none of these are Franklin's real problem. His real problem is that his landlord is dead, laid out on the linoleum of his kitchen, and Switzerland seems farther away all the time."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0524240/","name":"Matt Lucas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001780/","name":"Peter Stormare"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001001/","name":"James Caan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0959774/","name":"Jonas Åkerlund"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0337652/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0139919/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0374424/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2411346/","name":"Chris Millis"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

Superbad
programme.desc: Superbad: Directed by Greg Mottola. With Jonah Hill, Michael Cera, Christopher Mintz-Plasse, Bill Hader. Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0829482/","name":"Superbad","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc0NjIyMjA2OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzIxNDE1MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0829482/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Gordon-11"},"dateCreated":"2018-08-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Impressive","reviewBody":"Normally I don't like this kind of film about teenagers trying to act like adults, but this film really works. It is funny, it has brotherhood, friendship and romance all in one. It is impolite at times but it is not over the top. It doesn't feel annoying or stupid either, which is actually quite impressive."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":546677,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2007-08-17","keywords":"crooked cop,teen comedy,teen sexuality,high school,underage drinking","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Superbad","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1602730521","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzAxY2M2YzgtMjkzZC00MmEyLWJlMGQtOGVmNGZjYTlhZTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzAxY2M2YzgtMjkzZC00MmEyLWJlMGQtOGVmNGZjYTlhZTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer NOMPAA"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0148418/","name":"Michael Cera"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1706767/","name":"Jonah Hill"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2395586/","name":"Christopher Mintz-Plasse"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0609549/","name":"Greg Mottola"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0073081/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0736622/","name":"Seth Rogen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1698571/","name":"Evan Goldberg"}],"duration":"PT1H53M"}</script><metacontent="

His real problem is that his landlord is dead, laid out on the linoleum of his kitchen, and Switzerland seems farther away all the time."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0524240/","name":"Matt Lucas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001780/","name":"Peter Stormare"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001001/","name":"James Caan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0959774/","name":"Jonas Åkerlund"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0337652/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0139919/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0374424/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2411346/","name":"Chris Millis"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

A man is surrounded by strange events and odd neighbors in this adaptation of Chris Millis' novel." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1272886/","name":"Small Apartments","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzg3NDIwNjk5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDMxMzY0OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man is surrounded by strange events and odd neighbors in this adaptation of Chris Millis' novel.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1272886/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"harveer_chauhan","dateCreated":"2013-03-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Small apartments and apparently smaller lives but not so small a lesson!","reviewBody":"This movie is weird and disturbing movie when it starts but by the end it proves true to the purpose it is intended to have. The lives of the residents of an apartment building change when the owner is accidentally killed by one of the inhabitant. It take a while to get the hang of the pulse of the movie and it requires a lot of patience. The main protagonist is a loner and a voyeur who misses his ill(mentally) brother from whom he gets his taped messages. Meanwhile he is trying to dispose off the dead body of the owner. 

You do not fall in love with its characters or empathize with them but it definitely scares you to see their lives and you pray not to end up like them. But there are few moments when you feel sad for the people portrayed who are stuck in their little world and have distant hopes of escape from it. This movie forces you to confront or at least acknowledge the alienation,apathy,and surrender of some in the modern society who live on it fringe with little expectation of any worthwhile impact on anyone's life other than their own. But still it leaves you with a nice little message about forgiveness , family and the meaning of a well lived life.

You are not going to remember this movie for long but it's decently directed eerie movie for a select few who are patient enough to take a lesson home.

PS: Watch at your own risk.Either you will hate it or you will applaud the efforts for such a real depiction of lives in small apartments!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7657,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"keywords":"punched in the stomach,scene of the crime,fellatio,landlord,talking to oneself in a mirror","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1273603865","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI5Mzc5NzM2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTMyMTEzMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI5Mzc5NzM2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTMyMTEzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Franklin Franklin plays the alphorn and dreams of Switzerland. programme.desc: Superbad: Directed by Greg Mottola. With Jonah Hill, Michael Cera, Christopher Mintz-Plasse, Bill Hader. Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0829482/","name":"Superbad","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc0NjIyMjA2OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzIxNDE1MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0829482/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Gordon-11"},"dateCreated":"2018-08-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Impressive","reviewBody":"Normally I don't like this kind of film about teenagers trying to act like adults, but this film really works. programme.title: Small Apartments
Sekrety małych mieszkań
Small Apartments
programme.desc:
Small Apartments: Directed by Jonas Åkerlund. With Matt Lucas, James Caan, Nugget, Juno Temple. A man is surrounded by strange events and odd neighbors in this adaptation of Chris Millis' novel." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1272886/","name":"Small Apartments","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzg3NDIwNjk5NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDMxMzY0OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man is surrounded by strange events and odd neighbors in this adaptation of Chris Millis' novel.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1272886/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"harveer_chauhan"},"dateCreated":"2013-03-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Small apartments and apparently smaller lives but not so small a lesson!","reviewBody":"This movie is weird and disturbing movie when it starts but by the end it proves true to the purpose it is intended to have. The lives of the residents of an apartment building change when the owner is accidentally killed by one of the inhabitant. It take a while to get the hang of the pulse of the movie and it requires a lot of patience. The main protagonist is a loner and a voyeur who misses his ill(mentally) brother from whom he gets his taped messages. Meanwhile he is trying to dispose off the dead body of the owner. 

You do not fall in love with its characters or empathize with them but it definitely scares you to see their lives and you pray not to end up like them. But there are few moments when you feel sad for the people portrayed who are stuck in their little world and have distant hopes of escape from it. This movie forces you to confront or at least acknowledge the alienation,apathy,and surrender of some in the modern society who live on it fringe with little expectation of any worthwhile impact on anyone's life other than their own. But still it leaves you with a nice little message about forgiveness , family and the meaning of a well lived life.

You are not going to remember this movie for long but it's decently directed eerie movie for a select few who are patient enough to take a lesson home.

PS: Watch at your own risk.Either you will hate it or you will applaud the efforts for such a real depiction of lives in small apartments!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7657,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"keywords":"punched in the stomach,scene of the crime,fellatio,landlord,talking to oneself in a mirror","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1273603865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI5Mzc5NzM2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTMyMTEzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI5Mzc5NzM2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTMyMTEzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Franklin Franklin plays the alphorn and dreams of Switzerland. His crazy brother sends him fingernail clippings in the mail. One of his neighbors is a forgetful pot-head, the other a gruff busybody who doesn't miss anything. Across the street live a mother and her fifteen-year-old daughter, whom he likes to watch from his window, but none of these are Franklin's real problem. His real problem is that his landlord is dead, laid out on the linoleum of his kitchen, and Switzerland seems farther away all the time."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0524240/","name":"Matt Lucas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001780/","name":"Peter Stormare"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001001/","name":"James Caan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0959774/","name":"Jonas Åkerlund"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0337652/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0139919/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0374424/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2411346/","name":"Chris Millis"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: 25 lat niewinnosci. Sprawa Tomka Komendy
25 lat niewinności. Sprawa Tomka Komendy
programme.desc:
25 lat niewinnosci. Sprawa Tomka Komendy: Directed by Jan Holoubek. With Piotr Trojan, Agata Kulesza, Dariusz Chojnacki, Jan Frycz. The ordinary life of Tomasz Komenda is turned upside down when he is wrongly accused of brutal murder and sentenced to 25 years in prison." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11368998/","name":"25 lat niewinnosci. Sprawa Tomka Komendy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2E3YWNhMTgtMzRiZS00N2UxLWJkYzEtOGYyMWFhNDhlZmExXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEwMTY3NDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The ordinary life of Tomasz Komenda is turned upside down when he is wrongly accused of brutal murder and sentenced to 25 years in prison.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11368998/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"v-26640"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"A powerful movie about how person can be sentenced on circumstantial evidences.","reviewBody":"Tomasz Komenda was sentenced about 3 years after the crime had been committed basing on simple idea - 'find me a man and we fill forge evidences against him'. What this move does not show is that at that time Attorney General, now deceased Lech Kaczynski had been urged that a killer is found and sentenced to silence medias hysteria and coverage about brutal murder and rape of that young girl. Later when the murder was put on Tomasz, he was publicly defamed by Lech Kaczynski. Despite Mr L. Kaczynski death in Smolensk plane crash and after Tomasz was exonerated, no polish public institution nor police have never apologized Tomasz for their actions, which is a standard practice in western democratic countries.

Not much changed in post-soviet bloc however after 1990 in terms of judiciary mentality. Human Rights Watch estimates that 1-3% of sentences in Poland may be those in which innocent people are sentenced just because either suspects were threatened by police to force to confess by beatings. No effective police control and their procedures exists as of today. You may call it a mafia or not but I believe it's not far from truth in Poland.

Personally I believe his family did not do enough to get him out of prison, a good lawyer would smash the case easily and he is worth every money, why did it happen 15 years later is a mystery for me.

As Tomasz said after his release, there are no good people in prisons , there is only evil.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":884,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-09-18","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3825975/","name":"Piotr Trojan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0474492/","name":"Agata Kulesza"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2621963/","name":"Dariusz Chojnacki"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1450132/","name":"Jan Holoubek"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0015575/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0185099/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1733303/","name":"Andrzej Golda"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1450132/","name":"Jan Holoubek"}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="

credits.actor: Piotr Trojan, Agata Kulesza, Dariusz Chojnacki, Jan Frycz, Łukasz Lewandowski, Mikołaj Chroboczek, Andrzej Konopka, Julian Świeżewski, Magdalena Różczka

programme.title: Oda do radosci
Oda do radości
programme.desc: Oda do radosci: Directed by Anna Kazejak, Jan Komasa, Maciej Migas. With Przemyslaw Bluszcz, Joanna Bogacka, Anna Maria Buczek, Malgorzata Buczkowska. Three stories of young disillusioned Poles of different background and region of origin. What binds them together is that they all meet on the bus to London shortly after Poland's entry into EU." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0480705/","name":"Oda do radosci","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmYyNWZjZjQtMjhmMi00ZDdjLWIzODktNGVhMTQwODUwMGEwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three stories of young disillusioned Poles of different background and region of origin. What binds them together is that they all meet on the bus to London shortly after Poland's entry into EU.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0480705/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"subhadeep_iitkgp"},"dateCreated":"2006-11-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Gorgeous","reviewBody":"This was the first Polish film I was watching, and going by the lofty cinematic standards set by Europeans I was expecting another beautifully crafted gritty drama depicting the pain of modern life- I was hardly disappointed. The film involves 3 parallel subplots( Silesia,Warsaw, The Sea) and depicts the changing lifestyle in Poland as viewed by three ambitious youngsters. Equipped with an unbelievably talented cast of young actors , Ode to Joy succeeds on every possible level of film-making. It is quite obvious that the script has been prepared with a lot of sensitivity and the direction and acting is flawless. What more could one ask from cinema?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":223,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2006-04-19","keywords":"anthology film,f rated,workers' strike,wedding dress,trailer home","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1669753/","name":"Przemyslaw Bluszcz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0091496/","name":"Joanna Bogacka"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2929316/","name":"Anna Maria Buczek"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2038130/","name":"Anna Kazejak"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1717924/","name":"Jan Komasa"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2034409/","name":"Maciej Migas"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086499/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0034872/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043688/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2038130/","name":"Anna Kazejak"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1717924/","name":"Jan Komasa"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2034409/","name":"Maciej Migas"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dalej jest dzień
programme.desc: Osamotniony Paweł (Paweł Bloch) pracuje, przewożąc mieszkańców wsi z jednej na drugą stronę rzeki. Pewnego dnia spostrzega nielegalnego imigranta pokonującego rzekę wpław. Postanawia wyciągnąć do niego pomocną dłoń.

programme.title: The Congress
Kongres
The Congress
programme.desc: The Congress: Directed by Ari Folman. With Robin Wright, Harvey Keitel, Sami Gayle, Jon Hamm. An aging, out-of-work actress accepts one last job, though the consequences of her decision affect her in ways she didn't consider." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1821641/","name":"The Congress","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE5MTUzNDk3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTUwNTQ5MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An aging, out-of-work actress accepts one last job, though the consequences of her decision affect her in ways she didn't consider.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1821641/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MdlndeHond"},"dateCreated":"2013-12-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Beautifully executed doom Scifi","reviewBody":"It's two movies really the first part where you feel the impending doom set upon Robin Wright as she is caught between either professionally die off soon or make a deal that takes it all. \n\nIt so vividly explores the fine line between choice and the illusion of having one. The second part has a strong resemblance to Waking Life in it's psychedelic execution more than Waltz with Bashir. Existentialism, morality, Corporatocracy and the beautiful animation make this the most marvellous yet terrifying Sci-fi I have seen in ages. Watch Harvey Keitels monologue in the first half, it is outstanding. Robin Wright is as always amazing and gets extra kudos for playing herself in an alternate universe where her career has failed. It is all together a masterpiece.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":18236,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Animation","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2013-07-03","keywords":"female protagonist,satire,dystopia,cinema,tom cruise character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi892512537","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjk1ODkwNzMwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjU3NDAwMDE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjk1ODkwNzMwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjU3NDAwMDE@._V1_.jpg","description":" \tAn aging, out-of-work actress accepts one last job, though the consequences of her decision affect her in ways she didn't consider"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000705/","name":"Robin Wright"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000172/","name":"Harvey Keitel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0358316/","name":"Jon Hamm"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0284369/","name":"Ari Folman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0232356/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052813/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054609/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501015/","name":"Stanislaw Lem"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0284369/","name":"Ari Folman"}],"duration":"PT2H2M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Nie ten czlowiek
Nie ten człowiek
programme.desc: Nie ten czlowiek: Directed by Pawel Wendorff. With Bartosz Turzynski, Slawomir Orzechowski, Jan Frycz, Jacek Braciak. The film is a surreal collage of interrelated threads revolving around history of thirty-year-old Kuba who, with his parents' encouragement, decides to take his first job. Though none too convinced, he starts work as a delivery man. Having set out on his first delivery soon after he witnesses a traffic accident. He ends up giving a statement at the police station. And his plans begin to unravel. By a twist of fate Kuba has no idea about the significance of the part he will have to play on this particular day." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1808335/","name":"Nie ten czlowiek","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDkzODc4ZGUtNGYzZi00YzdmLWJkMWMtZDE5YzYxNThiNDJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The film is a surreal collage of interrelated threads revolving around history of thirty-year-old Kuba who, with his parents' encouragement, decides to take his first job. programme.title: Fever Pitch
Miłosna zagrywka
Fever Pitch
programme.desc: Fever Pitch: Directed by Bobby Farrelly, Peter Farrelly. With Drew Barrymore, Jimmy Fallon, Jason Spevack, Jack Kehler. Lindsay is stuck in the middle of her relationship with Ben and his passion for the Boston Red Sox." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0332047/","name":"Fever Pitch","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMyNTE4ODA2N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzg5ODUyMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Lindsay is stuck in the middle of her relationship with Ben and his passion for the Boston Red Sox.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0332047/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MissPearBanana"},"dateCreated":"2006-02-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Awwww","reviewBody":"I saw this movie on Thursdays night after having a really boring day. I had no expectations, those I had were rather negative. Being that the only movie I've ever watched Jimmy in is the American version of Taxi with Queen Latifah(?)...don't ask why! But seriously..this movie is so cute! Drew Barrymore is always sweet, but I almost fell in love with Fallon's character. Why can't I meet a cute nerd like that. :) Movies like that are excellent. Simple, sweet and necessary. Sunday on a Thursdays. I'm not even a sports fan, but it's something about American movies with baseball that fascinates me. Probably the fact that we don't have that sport here in Norway.\n\n(My first comment ever.) Haha","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":44332,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2005-04-08","keywords":"mri,boston red sox,baltimore orioles,world series,ups","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Fever Pitch","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4121297177","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZThhYWEwMzctOGFjZS00NDI0LWJjNzktZTdiNDMwNjliN2E3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZThhYWEwMzctOGFjZS00NDI0LWJjNzktZTdiNDMwNjliN2E3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from 20th Century Fox"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000106/","name":"Drew Barrymore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0266422/","name":"Jimmy Fallon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1555151/","name":"Jason Spevack"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0125803/","name":"Bobby Farrelly"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0268380/","name":"Peter Farrelly"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017497/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0148520/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005838/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0304665/","name":"Lowell Ganz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0541632/","name":"Babaloo Mandel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0394984/","name":"Nick Hornby"}],"duration":"PT1H44M"}</script><metacontent="

Simple, sweet and necessary. Sunday on a Thursdays. I'm not even a sports fan, but it's something about American movies with baseball that fascinates me. programme.title: Hollywood Buzz
programme.desc: W programie nowości kinowe, relacje z planów zdjęciowych oraz ciekawostki związanych z gwiazdami srebrnego ekranu. O pracy nad najnowszymi hollywoodzkimi produkcjami opowiadają ich twórcy - znani reżyserzy i aktorzy. Autorzy magazynu przedstawiają również zwiastuny filmów wchodzących na ekrany kin.

programme.title: My Cousin Vinny
Mój kuzyn Vinny
My Cousin Vinny
programme.desc: My Cousin Vinny: Directed by Jonathan Lynn. With Joe Pesci, Ralph Macchio, Marisa Tomei, Mitchell Whitfield. Two New Yorkers accused of murder in rural Alabama while on their way back to college call in the help of one of their cousins, a loudmouth lawyer with no trial experience." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0104952/","name":"My Cousin Vinny","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxNDYzMTg1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzk4MDgxMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two New Yorkers accused of murder in rural Alabama while on their way back to college call in the help of one of their cousins, a loudmouth lawyer with no trial experience.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0104952/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"linoochie"},"dateCreated":"2005-08-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"The more I watch it --- the funnier it gets!!","reviewBody":"Definitely one of my all-time favorite comedies. Well directed, well acted -- priceless comic performances by Pesci, Tomei, Gwynne & Austin Pendleton. And more than comedy -- there's also a lot of genuine pathos and real tension and drama, especially in the final courtroom scene. And I really don't understand the "controversy" or brouhaha over Marisa Tomei receiving the Best Supporting Actress Oscar for her role in this movie. It's a crackerjack gem of a performance and a stellar comic portrayal. The only thing I can figure is that a lot of snobbery about serious dramatic portrayals somehow being more worthy of honor than great comic performances still very much lives on in much of the film community.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":116045,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"1992-03-13","keywords":"lawyer,trial,italian american,alabama,jail","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"My Cousin Vinny","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2744844569","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjc2NWI4YjctMWVhMy00MGViLTk5NzQtZGMwYWY3MzQwZWZhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjc2NWI4YjctMWVhMy00MGViLTk5NzQtZGMwYWY3MzQwZWZhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000582/","name":"Joe Pesci"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000673/","name":"Marisa Tomei"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001494/","name":"Ralph Macchio"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0528718/","name":"Jonathan Lynn"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0057987/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0731057/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0490958/","name":"Dale Launer"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Chocolate Road
Słodka droga do czekolady
Chocolate Road
programme.desc: Chocolate Road: Directed by Tanya Chuturkova. With Frances Louise Bekele, Joe Cullen Brown, Martin Christy, Elvin Ovidio Ávila Flores. Three renowned chocolatiers - Maribel Lieberman, Susumu Koyama and Mikkel Friis-Holm - take us through the process of craft chocolate-making all the way from the tree to the final chocolate piece. On their journey, each of them finds how important it is to know the roots of their primer material - the cacao bean, and how they can highly impact the lives of the people involved in the chocolate production chain." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9866220/","name":"Chocolate Road","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmExMzg3NmMtMzM0ZC00M2E0LWJkMzMtNjUyZjk1NTAwZWFlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjEzNjUxNTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three renowned chocolatiers - Maribel Lieberman, Susumu Koyama and Mikkel Friis-Holm - take us through the process of craft chocolate-making all the way from the tree to the final chocolate piece. programme.title: The New Mutants
Nowi mutanci
The New Mutants
programme.desc: The New Mutants: Directed by Josh Boone. With Maisie Williams, Anya Taylor-Joy, Charlie Heaton, Alice Braga. Five young mutants, just discovering their abilities while held in a secret facility against their will, fight to escape their past sins and save themselves." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4682266/","name":"The New Mutants","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDQ2NTdmNDgtMGIwMS00ODE2LTk5M2EtZGZhYzc4MWRlNTU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTc4MjczMTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Five young mutants, just discovering their abilities while held in a secret facility against their will, fight to escape their past sins and save themselves.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4682266/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sara-691"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"This movie desperately needed whatever they edited out.","reviewBody":"It was an OK movie all in all, but it could've been SO much better. I was personally stoked for a horror mutants movie, but this is as much horror as any other superhero movie (and less than some) so I must say I was very disappointed. The idea of was there and it could've been SO SO good but in the end, it wasn't...\n\nA thing that really distracted me was the actors weird accents. You have a group of really good actors here but the bad accents made them just seem mediocre.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":68455,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2020-08-28","keywords":"mutant,based on comic book,marvel comics,x men,superheroine","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Comic-Con Teaser","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1041219097","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmIyNDQxZDgtNTY0NS00ZDcxLTkwNDgtYjQ1ZGI0NGU2ODcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmIyNDQxZDgtNTY0NS00ZDcxLTkwNDgtYjQ1ZGI0NGU2ODcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Twentieth Century Studios in association with Marvel Entertainment presents The New Mutants, an original horror thriller set in an isolated hospital where a group of young mutants is being held for psychiatric monitoring. When strange occurrences begin to take place, both their new mutant abilities and their friendships will be tested as they battle to try and make it out alive. Directed by Josh Boone (The Fault in our Stars) and written by Josh Boone & Knate Lee, The New Mutants stars: Maisie Williams (Game of Thrones); Anya Taylor-Joy (Glass); Charlie Heaton (Stranger Things); Alice Braga (Predators); Blu Hunt (The Originals); and Henry Zaga (13 Reasons Why). The film is produced by Simon Kinberg, p.g.a., Karen Rosenfelt and Lauren Shuler Donner with Stan Lee and Michele Imperato Stabile serving as executive producers."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3586035/","name":"Maisie Williams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5896355/","name":"Anya Taylor-Joy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6390427/","name":"Charlie Heaton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1837748/","name":"Josh Boone"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0781821/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0566686/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047120/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1837748/","name":"Josh Boone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1029878/","name":"Knate Lee"}],"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Water for Elephants
Woda dla słoni
Water for Elephants
programme.desc:
Water for Elephants: Directed by Francis Lawrence. With Reese Witherspoon, Robert Pattinson, Christoph Waltz, Paul Schneider. Set in the 1930s, a former veterinary student takes a job in a travelling circus and falls in love with the ringmaster's wife." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1067583/","name":"Water for Elephants","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQzMDU3NDEwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTI3MDU0NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in the 1930s, a former veterinary student takes a job in a travelling circus and falls in love with the ringmaster's wife.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1067583/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"catarinaloss"},"dateCreated":"2011-04-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"One Spectacular Show","reviewBody":"Readers, fear not. This is one adaption that lives up to the book.

Water for Elephants is pure beauty. Despite the fact that it takes place during the Depression, it makes you almost wish you lived during the '30s.

One reason is the costumes. They are wonderfully done, as well as the makeup. Another is the eye candy. No, I'm not talking about Robert Pattinson(though he looks as gorgeous as ever). I'm talking about the breathtaking cinematography, courtesy of Rodrigo Prieto.

While the leads(Robert Pattinson, Reese Witherspoon, Christoph Waltz) all turn in GREAT performances, the real star here is Tai the elephant. She plays Rosie, the newest addition to The Benzini Bros. Most Spectacular Show on Earth, who is brought in in hopes of taking The Benzini Bros. circus to a new level(particularly to the level of Ringling Bros.).

As per usual, there are quite a few changes that may or may not irritate the readers. It all depends on the person. One that I felt was an improvement upon the book, however, was the combining of August and Uncle Al. I honestly didn't miss Al one bit.

Water for Elephants is a beautiful, enchanting, mesmerizing must-see.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":114198,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2011-04-22","keywords":"animal abuse,circus,elephant,ringmaster,train","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2: Water for Elephants","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1397594649","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA0MzA4MjYxOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzc1NTYzNTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA0MzA4MjYxOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzc1NTYzNTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A veterinary student (Robert Pattinson) abandons his studies after his parents are killed and joins a traveling circus as their vet, where he meets animal trainer August (Christoph Waltz) and his wife Marlena (Reese Witherspoon)."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1500155/","name":"Robert Pattinson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000702/","name":"Reese Witherspoon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0910607/","name":"Christoph Waltz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1349376/","name":"Francis Lawrence"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017497/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070636/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0177280/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0481418/","name":"Richard LaGravenese"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2717485/","name":"Sara Gruen"}],"duration":"PT2H2M"}</script><metacontent="
