programme.title: Breaking News in Yuba County
Skandal w hrabstwie Yuba
Breaking News In Yuba County
programme.desc:
Breaking News in Yuba County: Directed by Tate Taylor. With Allison Janney, Mila Kunis, Regina Hall, Awkwafina. A woman takes advantage of her growing celebrity status when the police and the public think her dead husband is just missing." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7737640/","name":"Breaking News in Yuba County","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWJkMTg1NWUtN2E0Yy00Y2M4LWEyMjItMjQ4ZDBiYmY3ZWIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A woman takes advantage of her growing celebrity status when the police and the public think her dead husband is just missing.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7737640/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"stklaus"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"I'm not sure why critics hate this one","reviewBody":"This is a light black slapstick comedy, which runs low-key, nothing spectacular, but is never boring. The humour and the film is driven by its entangled plot, for once it doesn't comprise laugh-out-loud, gross (there is some violence) or forced jokes, no, it's the satiric story that is fun and entertaining.

Since lots of people are involved, I give you some story infos for an easier watch (which won't spoil anything):

Her (A.Janney) husband Karl (M. Modine), a banker, was involved in money laundering and now ows money to the bad guys. Her brother Pete (J. Simpson) seemed to do some robbery and is also involved with the bad guys coincidentally. Her sister (Mila Kunis) works for a small TV station.

After lots and lots of bad comedies this was a surprise; maybe it's a bit harsh with American lifestyle, thats why they hated it(?)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4439,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-02-12","keywords":"place name in title,county name in title,place in title,search for missing husband,half sister","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3228614937","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDk1NTI2MTctN2NkMy00MDdhLWI5MjYtYjY1ZDA4ZmExMDhmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDk1NTI2MTctN2NkMy00MDdhLWI5MjYtYjY1ZDA4ZmExMDhmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"After her husband goes missing, Sue Buttons (Allison Janney), an underappreciated suburban wife, gets a taste of being a local celebrity as she embarks on a search to find him. She quickly finds herself in over her head, dodging cops, criminals and local reporters all aiming to uncover the truth. After being overlooked for so long, Sue goes to exaggerated lengths to prolong her "15 minutes of fame" and keep the truth from coming out."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005049/","name":"Allison Janney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005109/","name":"Mila Kunis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0356021/","name":"Regina Hall"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0853238/","name":"Tate Taylor"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0690042/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0564372/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0785702/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3302028/","name":"Amanda Idoko"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

Unhinged
programme.desc: Unhinged: Directed by Derrick Borte. With Russell Crowe, Caren Pistorius, Gabriel Bateman, Jimmi Simpson. After a confrontation with an unstable man at an intersection, a woman becomes the target of his rage." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10059518/","name":"Unhinged","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjc1Mjg5NjItY2I2MS00NDk3LWI5NGYtNzZjNTNiZmMwZTA3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjM4NTM5NDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"After a confrontation with an unstable man at an intersection, a woman becomes the target of his rage.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10059518/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Impartial-Reviewer"},"dateCreated":"2020-10-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Many People, Few Manners.","reviewBody":"An unstable man under a lot of life stress confront a woman who's having a bad life and a bad day at an intersection. In it what can be cured with a simple apology, yet out of arrogance escalates into a hellish nightmare as the woman's whole life becomes a target of the man's rage. Out of technicality, the plot is quite simple with few logical gaps. with that in mind and aside from the ridiculously bad choices which the female lead makes across the whole movie not to mention her passive boring personality...Yet with a raw chilling performance from Russell Crowe who owned the aggression and hate of his role, he single handedly managed to elevate the movie to a notable level of thrills, entertainment and excitement. The director succeeds in painting some interesting surprises in the car chase scenes and an over all thrilling experience that is worth watching.\n\nUnlike some views, I experienced this movie from a different point of view, to me the whole idea revolves around the concept of decency and common courtesy among mankind that most of us lost, maybe the fake bubble of freedom and personal rights that we live our daily lives in or how awfully some were raised on a fake racist patriotism which believes that a certain nationality/race is above others or or or. All are false reasons to be rude, mistreat others or lose compassion and courtesy for one another. Either you watch Unhinged for the thrilling entertainment or for the eye opening message the results is quite satisfying on both ends."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":59311,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-07-31","keywords":"stabbed in the eye with scissors,driving,road rage,psychopath,stalking","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3319512601","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjA2MWY5ZGQtNmZkNS00NzFiLTlhNTYtMWJmMzA2ZDVlNDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjA2MWY5ZGQtNmZkNS00NzFiLTlhNTYtMWJmMzA2ZDVlNDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"Academy Award winner Russell Crowe stars in a timely psychological thriller that explores the fragile balance of a society pushed to the edge, taking something we’ve all experienced — road rage — to an unpredictable and terrifying conclusion."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000128/","name":"Russell Crowe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3308569/","name":"Caren Pistorius"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5145655/","name":"Gabriel Bateman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0097517/","name":"Derrick Borte"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0784470/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0531993/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0716530/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0255296/","name":"Carl Ellsworth"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Nuestras madres
Nasze matki
Nuestras madres
programme.desc:
Nuestras madres: Directed by Cesar Diaz. With Armando Espitia, Emma Dib, Aurelia Caal, Julio Serrano Echeverría. Ernesto is a young anthropologist in Guatemala. One day, while hearing the account of an old woman, he thinks he has found a lead that might guide him to his father, a "guerrillero" who went missing during the war." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9206516/","name":"Nuestras madres","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDk3NDI3MmItYzVmMy00MTFiLThkMGMtNDlkN2M4OGI3NDQzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTM2NTg3Nzg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ernesto is a young anthropologist in Guatemala. One day, while hearing the account of an old woman, he thinks he has found a lead that might guide him to his father, a "guerrillero" who went missing during the war.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9206516/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"vesperview"},"dateCreated":"2020-07-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"For a movie titled Nuestras Madres, the mothers aren't really at the helm of it","reviewBody":"I had high expectations for this movie as it generated a lot of buzz for winning the Caméra d'Or at Cannes, however, upon watching the movie you slowly realize that this film is not really about the indigenous mothers who fell victim to the Guatemalan armed conflict, but rather about a young man who works as an anthropologist that has a personal stake for helping these women who are searching for the remains of their loved ones. He really only helps them because he is looking for the remains of his father, all while his own mother tries to deter him from searching for his father as she's keeping a secret from him.

The film is beautifully shot, there is a sequence where the the women are photographed while providing their testimonies which is beautiful, but as I stated previously, the film fails to amplify the voices that give it its title and it failed to do so because it was told through the wrong point of view. It reminds me a little bit of The Help and how Skeeter, a white woman, is the protagonist in a story about black maids suffering from racism. Here you have Ernesto, a male looking for his father's remains, taking center stage in what should be a story about the suffering of these women.

"Mi Padre" would've been a more appropriate title.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":647,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-06-16","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [English SUB]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi578141721","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmUxOTQwOWQtNGExMy00YTM0LTg2ZjAtNTFjOWQ0ODQzYjE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmUxOTQwOWQtNGExMy00YTM0LTg2ZjAtNTFjOWQ0ODQzYjE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5638007/","name":"Armando Espitia"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1756304/","name":"Emma Dib"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11343355/","name":"Aurelia Caal"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3969062/","name":"Cesar Diaz"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0025947/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0301560/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0511943/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3969062/","name":"Cesar Diaz"}],"duration":"PT1H18M"}</script><metacontent="

Eternal Beauty
programme.desc: Eternal Beauty: Directed by Craig Roberts. With Sally Hawkins, Morfydd Clark, Robert Pugh, Natalie O'Neill. After Jane falls into a state of despair over her schizophrenia, she encounters new sources of love and life with surprising results." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5362940/","name":"Eternal Beauty","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWE3ZmZhOTctOTU5Ny00MTM0LWFkZjctYjc0OWI1ZjM3MzQ5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"After Jane falls into a state of despair over her schizophrenia, she encounters new sources of love and life with surprising results.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5362940/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"steveo122"},"dateCreated":"2020-08-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"excruciating","reviewBody":"I curse the sadistic bstrds who conned me into watching what I rigorously avoid seeing by casting Sally Hawkins. My first thought was about the appropriateness of a mentally unbalanced protagonist these days. But it's SallyfckngHawkins and she gives an exquisite performance of palpable human turmoil that causes emotional empathy - they might as well have filmed a wounded baby bird struggling to stumble its way across a busy sidewalk toward unseen cats - excruciating. Everyone is very good, even the vile ones...the plot, script and direction are noticeably stylized and always interesting.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1618,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2020-10-02","keywords":"psychiatric hospital,three sisters,overbearing mother,hearing voices,psychosis","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1868414489","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmVjYjhhM2MtYjc0NC00N2UzLTg0ZDQtYjU3MzE0NjIzYTY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmVjYjhhM2MtYjc0NC00N2UzLTg0ZDQtYjU3MzE0NjIzYTY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"After Jane (Sally Hawkins) falls into a state of despair over her schizophrenia, she encounters new sources of love and life with surprising results."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1020089/","name":"Sally Hawkins"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6077056/","name":"Morfydd Clark"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0700059/","name":"Robert Pugh"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1064292/","name":"Craig Roberts"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0607578/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037450/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0670857/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1064292/","name":"Craig Roberts"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Chemia
Chemia
programme.desc:
Chemia: Directed by Bartosz Prokopowicz. With Agnieszka Zulewska, Tomasz Schuchardt, Danuta Stenka, Eryk Lubos. Thirty year old Benek experiences a crisis mainly manifested by compulsive suicidal thoughts and dreams about death. Accidentally he meets a beautiful, magnetic and mouthy Lena. He is dazzled from the first moment and his admiration grows when Lena not only understands his suicidal preoccupation but shares a similar one. They embark on a crazy journey during which Benek realizes he is not the only man in Lena's life - in addition, the girl has cancer, and she is not attempting to treat it. Admiration mixes with fear - finally Benek promises to accompany her to the end..." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4088848/","name":"Chemia","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTdhMGVhM2QtNDcyNC00NWI5LThmNjUtMzQ1OGU4OWE5MDA1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Thirty year old Benek experiences a crisis mainly manifested by compulsive suicidal thoughts and dreams about death. Accidentally he meets a beautiful, magnetic and mouthy Lena. He is dazzled from the first moment and his admiration ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4088848/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Red-125"},"dateCreated":"2015-11-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Cancer vs. suicide--not a happy film","reviewBody":"The Polish film Chemia was shown in the U.S. with the title Chemo (2015). It was co-written and directed by Bartosz Prokopowicz. The film stars Agnieszka Zulewska as Lena, a woman with breast cancer, and Tomasz Schuchardt as Benek, a physically healthy man obsessed with his own suicide.

When the two people met, the chemistry--while admittedly strange--is powerful. The rest of the film follows Lena and Benek as they interact with the world, with each other, and with the disease and suicide.

Agnieszka Zulewska must be the most beautiful woman in Poland. It's clear that director Prokopowicz can't take his eyes--or the camera-- off her. It unbalances the film a little, but it's truly amazing to see a skilled actor totally dominate a movie.

We saw this film at the excellent Little Theatre in Rochester, NY, as part of the High Falls Film Festival. HFFF is "Celebrating Women in Film." Since the director is a man, this film surely was chosen because of Agnieszka Zulewska's star performance. It will work well on a small screen. Try to find it and watch it--it's worth seeking out.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":371,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2015-10-02","keywords":"cancer,chemo","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4521098/","name":"Agnieszka Zulewska"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3949598/","name":"Tomasz Schuchardt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0826611/","name":"Danuta Stenka"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698616/","name":"Bartosz Prokopowicz"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0502289/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0484652/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0391378/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698616/","name":"Bartosz Prokopowicz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5025978/","name":"Katarzyna Sarnowska"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Fighting with My Family
Na ringu z rodziną
Fighting with My Family
programme.desc:
Fighting with My Family: Directed by Stephen Merchant. With Dwayne Johnson, Thomas Whilley, Tori Ellen Ross, Nick Frost. A former wrestler and his family make a living performing at small venues around the country while his kids dream of joining World Wrestling Entertainment." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6513120/","name":"Fighting with My Family","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWM0NGUxMzUtMjRlZS00OWZlLTlkZDMtMzJhOWVmZDY2ODczXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTQxNzM2MjY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A former wrestler and his family make a living performing at small venues around the country while his kids dream of joining World Wrestling Entertainment.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6513120/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"markthomassintek"},"dateCreated":"2019-03-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Typical feel good film, made in the best of British style","reviewBody":"REVIEW - FIGHTING WITH MY FAMILY

At first glance this film is a very British film and watching it I thought would American film goers even go to see it because it is very British, the humour, the accents, the houses but at the end of the film I actually realised the most important thing, something that isn't even being used for the promotion of this feel good film, it's actually a true story!

Yes an underdog from Norwich did win the Diva WWE championship belt, not once but twice!

Typical feel good film, made in the best of British style and Dwayne The Rock Johnson producing!

I will admit I was pleasantly surprised by this film and actually laughed out loud at a few of the British jokes included, because of this I now will have to eat my words and take back what I said at the start of this review, yes this appeals to British film goers and yes it will certainly appeal to American film goers also, good call Steven Merchant

Rating 7 out of 10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":75584,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-02-22","keywords":"brother sister relationship,jock strap on head,wrestling,based on true story,based on real person","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1699789337","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjNmNGI3YzktZWM4OS00NzY5LWI0M2UtNDkxZDM5MDVkZGUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjNmNGI3YzktZWM4OS00NzY5LWI0M2UtNDkxZDM5MDVkZGUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0425005/","name":"Dwayne Johnson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0372176/","name":"Lena Headey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000681/","name":"Vince Vaughn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0580351/","name":"Stephen Merchant"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103528/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0197272/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0580351/","name":"Stephen Merchant"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

A former wrestler and his family make a living performing at small venues around the country while his kids dream of joining World Wrestling Entertainment." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6513120/","name":"Fighting with My Family","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWM0NGUxMzUtMjRlZS00OWZlLTlkZDMtMzJhOWVmZDY2ODczXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTQxNzM2MjY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A former wrestler and his family make a living performing at small venues around the country while his kids dream of joining World Wrestling Entertainment.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6513120/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"markthomassintek","dateCreated":"2019-03-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Typical feel good film, made in the best of British style","reviewBody":"REVIEW - FIGHTING WITH MY FAMILY

At first glance this film is a very British film and watching it I thought would American film goers even go to see it because it is very British, the humour, the accents, the houses but at the end of the film I actually realised the most important thing, something that isn't even being used for the promotion of this feel good film, it's actually a true story!

Yes an underdog from Norwich did win the Diva WWE championship belt, not once but twice!

Typical feel good film, made in the best of British style and Dwayne The Rock Johnson producing!

I will admit I was pleasantly surprised by this film and actually laughed out loud at a few of the British jokes included, because of this I now will have to eat my words and take back what I said at the start of this review, yes this appeals to British film goers and yes it will certainly appeal to American film goers also, good call Steven Merchant

programme.desc: Diablada: Directed by Álvaro Muñoz. With Daniel Candia, Cristián Chaparro, Karin Mayorinca, Ernesto Meléndez. A group of girls from a little town in the desert, disappears systematically without the police or the authorities taking action on the matter. Families seek help, but are faced with bureaucracy, discrimination and total abandonment." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt14237412/","name":"Diablada","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjk5Y2VlZmMtOTY0NC00MzJhLWJkYjctNGY4ODA0YmQ4NDE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjUxNjk0ODc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of girls from a little town in the desert, disappears systematically without the police or the authorities taking action on the matter. Families seek help, but are faced with bureaucracy, discrimination and total abandonment.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt14237412/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"karolfancinema"},"dateCreated":"2021-06-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Distorting and taking advantage of a real tragedy, which affects the families of the real victims.","reviewBody":"Unfortunately, this film was made without the consent and rights of the real mothers of the victims. This film tells a real dramatic event, which even today opens wounds and consequences in the families of the victims, poor families that have not yet received real reparation from the state of Chile. Organizations for the protection of women in Chile are condemning this production that profits from this tragedy and is once again re-victimizing the case and affecting even more the families of the girls and women who suffered this real tragedy. That's horrible! This should have been a serious documentary of reparation for the victims and not a commercial product that also distorts reality.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":73,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2021-03-14","keywords":"northern chile,one word title,serial killer","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4461567/","name":"Daniel Candia"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1275107/","name":"Cristián Chaparro"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm12434889/","name":"Karin Mayorinca"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7100327/","name":"Álvaro Muñoz"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0583592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1146177/","name":"Omar Saavedra Santis"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ghostbusters II
Wojna państwa Rose
The War of the Roses
programme.desc: Ghostbusters II: Directed by Ivan Reitman. With Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Sigourney Weaver, Harold Ramis. The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0097428/","name":"Ghostbusters II","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NTk4MjE5Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODIwNjYxMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0097428/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"utgard14"},"dateCreated":"2014-08-30","inLanguage":"English","name":""We're here tonight because a psychomagnotheric slime flow of immense proportions is building up beneath the city."","reviewBody":"Tedious retread sequel never reaches the heights of the first Ghosbusters. It just feels like the guys got back together to goof off and get paid for it. Bill Murray seems alternately amused and bored throughout the film. The rest go through the motions. As for new faces, Peter MacNicol is extremely annoying, basically playing the role Rick Moranis played last time. Moranis actually reprises his role but has nothing to do and is shoehorned into things with irritating results. It's not a bad movie. It's enjoyable enough due to the likability of their stars but the story is weak and there's nothing memorable about the whole thing.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":194250,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Comedy","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"1989-06-16","keywords":"ghost,new york city,ghostbuster,baby,slime","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ghostbusters II","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2401943065","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWUxOTJiOWEtZDY3Yi00MTMzLTk2NWItOWUxNGU4MzJmNWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWUxOTJiOWEtZDY3Yi00MTMzLTk2NWItOWUxNGU4MzJmNWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer 2"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000195/","name":"Bill Murray"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000244/","name":"Sigourney Weaver"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0718645/","name":"Ivan Reitman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000601/","name":"Harold Ramis"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Saint Frances
Święta Frances
Saint Frances
programme.desc: Saint Frances: Directed by Alex Thompson. With Kelly O'Sullivan, Ramona Edith Williams, Charin Alvarez, Lily Mojekwu. After an accidental pregnancy turned abortion, a deadbeat nanny finds an unlikely friendship with the six-year old she's charged with protecting." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9016016/","name":"Saint Frances","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWFkODE5NjctZjc1Ni00OTIwLWFjYjAtZTU2MDFkZDI1NmMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjQ0NzcxNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"After an accidental pregnancy turned abortion, a deadbeat nanny finds an unlikely friendship with the six-year old she's charged with protecting.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9016016/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rattyrat"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Ignore the haters","reviewBody":"With the lazy terminology in the comments of woke, snowflake and agenda I thought I had stumbled on a trump gossip column...I found it not always easy to watch being a squeamish bloke when it comes to female sanitary situations but hey that's me and this is life and for that I like to think this film is brave and realistic .My favourite type of film is of everyday occurrence realism if you like ,the main actors are all great and convincing and also some much needed Humour pops up from time to time . I would definitely recommend this if not for the fact it addresses issues ...as a man ...I've never seen in film before .loved it and bought a tear to my eye a few times .","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4201,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-02-28","keywords":"pregnancy,abortion,nanny,beach,depression","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Saint Frances","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3730882329","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzBlMWM3ZTktNjQ5My00YzFjLTk0MjEtNjI3ZTZmM2U3MmRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzBlMWM3ZTktNjQ5My00YzFjLTk0MjEtNjI3ZTZmM2U3MmRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 1"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3643779/","name":"Kelly O'Sullivan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10130595/","name":"Ramona Edith Williams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2725075/","name":"Charin Alvarez"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3930165/","name":"Alex Thompson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0460856/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020341/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0538483/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3643779/","name":"Kelly O'Sullivan"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Fighting with My Family
Na ringu z rodziną
Fighting with My Family
programme.desc:
Fighting with My Family: Directed by Stephen Merchant. With Dwayne Johnson, Thomas Whilley, Tori Ellen Ross, Nick Frost. A former wrestler and his family make a living performing at small venues around the country while his kids dream of joining World Wrestling Entertainment." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6513120/","name":"Fighting with My Family","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWM0NGUxMzUtMjRlZS00OWZlLTlkZDMtMzJhOWVmZDY2ODczXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTQxNzM2MjY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A former wrestler and his family make a living performing at small venues around the country while his kids dream of joining World Wrestling Entertainment.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6513120/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"markthomassintek"},"dateCreated":"2019-03-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Typical feel good film, made in the best of British style","reviewBody":"REVIEW - FIGHTING WITH MY FAMILY

At first glance this film is a very British film and watching it I thought would American film goers even go to see it because it is very British, the humour, the accents, the houses but at the end of the film I actually realised the most important thing, something that isn't even being used for the promotion of this feel good film, it's actually a true story!

Yes an underdog from Norwich did win the Diva WWE championship belt, not once but twice!

Typical feel good film, made in the best of British style and Dwayne The Rock Johnson producing!

I will admit I was pleasantly surprised by this film and actually laughed out loud at a few of the British jokes included, because of this I now will have to eat my words and take back what I said at the start of this review, yes this appeals to British film goers and yes it will certainly appeal to American film goers also, good call Steven Merchant

Rating 7 out of 10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":75584,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-02-22","keywords":"brother sister relationship,jock strap on head,wrestling,based on true story,based on real person","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1699789337","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjNmNGI3YzktZWM4OS00NzY5LWI0M2UtNDkxZDM5MDVkZGUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjNmNGI3YzktZWM4OS00NzY5LWI0M2UtNDkxZDM5MDVkZGUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0425005/","name":"Dwayne Johnson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0372176/","name":"Lena Headey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000681/","name":"Vince Vaughn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0580351/","name":"Stephen Merchant"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103528/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0197272/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0580351/","name":"Stephen Merchant"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

At first glance this film is a very British film and watching it I thought would American film goers even go to see it because it is very British, the humour, the accents, the houses but at the end of the film I actually realised the most important thing, something that isn't even being used for the promotion of this feel good film, it's actually a true story!

Yes an underdog from Norwich did win the Diva WWE championship belt, not once but twice!

Typical feel good film, made in the best of British style and Dwayne The Rock Johnson producing!

I will admit I was pleasantly surprised by this film and actually laughed out loud at a few of the British jokes included, because of this I now will have to eat my words and take back what I said at the start of this review, yes this appeals to British film goers and yes it will certainly appeal to American film goers also, good call Steven Merchant

programme.title: The Dark Crystal
Ciemny kryształ
The Dark Crystal
programme.desc: The Dark Crystal: Directed by Jim Henson, Frank Oz. With Jim Henson, Kathryn Mullen, Frank Oz, Dave Goelz. On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and to restore order to his world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0083791/","name":"The Dark Crystal","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTU2MmJiZmQtZjBmMS00MTk4LWFmOWYtZGQzOTY5ODNjYWVhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and to restore order to his world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0083791/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"winstonsmith_84"},"dateCreated":"2000-12-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Dream","reviewBody":"This movie is like an odd, but wonderful dream. It takes place in a fantasy world, created by the talented duo, Frank Oz and Jim Henson. Everything in this film is so meticulously done, that it still lives on to this day. Computer effects be damned. This film has texture, and it is pleasing to watch. This movie, as you will see, was made for kids. But really, it is a masterpiece in film-making. True, good, story-telling. Sure, kids will love it, but the film isn't really aimed at them like most kid movies are. It is complicated, eerie, beautiful, and intelligent... most of all, mystical. I reccomend this to anyone seriously interested in film, especially fantasy... not to be missed!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":64689,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Family","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"1982-12-17","keywords":"puppetry,magical crystal,crystal shard,cult favorite,puppet","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Teaser","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi629389593","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDEzMjBjM2QtN2Y0Mi00ZGY4LTgzZTYtYTQwZWZiYzIyMjc0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDEzMjBjM2QtN2Y0Mi00ZGY4LTgzZTYtYTQwZWZiYzIyMjc0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Rediscover the age of wonder inspired by Jim Henson's groundbreaking vision. programme.title: Jojo Rabbit
Jojo Rabbit
programme.desc:
Jojo Rabbit: Directed by Taika Waititi. With Roman Griffin Davis, Thomasin McKenzie, Scarlett Johansson, Taika Waititi. A young German boy in the Hitler Youth whose hero and imaginary friend is the country's dictator is shocked to discover that his mother is hiding a Jewish girl in their home." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2584384/","name":"Jojo Rabbit","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjU0Yzk2MzEtMjAzYy00MzY0LTg2YmItM2RkNzdkY2ZhN2JkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDg4NjY5OTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young German boy in the Hitler Youth whose hero and imaginary friend is the country's dictator is shocked to discover that his mother is hiding a Jewish girl in their home.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2584384/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"EvilMissQB"},"dateCreated":"2019-11-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Moving, hilarious...tragic","reviewBody":"The trailer for the movie had me scratching my head but as a HUGE fan of Waititi I felt I ought to give it a shot.

My best spoiler free review is that this is an original, outrageous film. The emotional gamut we are subjected to is whiplash inducing, but without the neck brace and ambulance chasing lawyers.

Every actor is perfection. Young JoJo and Yorkie are devastatingly earnest and so talented. Sam Rockwell is always a master. Every subtle satire is underwritten with a grim level of truth. The soundtrack n unexpected choice.

Go see it. Prepare yourself for quite a ride.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":346196,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2019-10-24","keywords":"nazi germany,world war two,satire,mother son relationship,black comedy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2663366425","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGIzMWMzMTgtZjNmOC00ZTMyLWJkZDItZWUxNGQ0OWNhMzFhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGIzMWMzMTgtZjNmOC00ZTMyLWJkZDItZWUxNGQ0OWNhMzFhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Writer director Taika Waititi (THOR: RAGNAROK, HUNT FOR THE WILDERPEOPLE), brings his signature style of humor and pathos to his latest film, JOJO RABBIT, a World War II satire that follows a lonely German boy (Roman Griffin Davis as JoJo) whose world view is turned upside down when he discovers his single mother (Scarlett Johansson) is hiding a young Jewish girl (Thomasin McKenzie) in their attic. Aided only by his idiotic imaginary friend, Adolf Hitler (Taika Waititi), Jojo must confront his blind nationalism."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9877392/","name":"Roman Griffin Davis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5057169/","name":"Thomasin McKenzie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0424060/","name":"Scarlett Johansson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0169806/","name":"Taika Waititi"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0420822/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0537672/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0118715/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9862836/","name":"Christine Leunens"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0169806/","name":"Taika Waititi"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Honeymoon Phase
Miesiąc miodowy
The Honeymoon Phase
programme.desc: The Honeymoon Phase: Directed by Phillip G. Carroll Jr.. With François Chau, Tara Westwood, Ione Butler, Mike Sutton. Struggling young lovers, Tom and Eve, must endure a 30-day scientific experiment. Room, board, $50,000 and a month alone together in research facility housing. What could possibly go wrong." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7277942/","name":"The Honeymoon Phase","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGQ4MTU1MDUtMmFjNS00Y2M3LWE3YWYtODNkMGMyOGM2ZDlhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"Struggling young lovers, Tom and Eve, must endure a 30-day scientific experiment. Room, board, $50,000 and a month alone together in research facility housing. What could possibly go wrong.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7277942/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"workobeyfilms"},"dateCreated":"2020-08-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Solid debut showing much promise in the future","reviewBody":"I adamantly follow many indie horror filmmakers online and became acquainted with The Carrolls' work on YouTube as far back as 2016. Having been heartbroken many times from seeing many short film filmmakers climb that 'feature film mountain' and not quite stick the landing, I'm always nervous to see anyone's debut features, but I'm wholeheartedly relieved 'that ember' I recognized in them is a 'warm and fiery arrival' to the big stage. Their shorts throughout the years has always been of quality, but their debut reaches an additional tier of polish and effective storytelling that deserves recognition, that 'glass ceiling' many of us horror filmmakers aspire to breakthrough. I truly feel they've 'arrived' and are contenders with much promise that, in the long-term, many will find much thrills and enjoyment from."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":911,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.5},"genre":["Horror","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-08-21","keywords":"research,marriage,twist,young couple,security cameras","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3003563545","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzYyOGY3ZDEtNjkxMi00MzRlLTk2YjktMDZjMzY2ZDRlYzUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzYyOGY3ZDEtNjkxMi00MzRlLTk2YjktMDZjMzY2ZDRlYzUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"A struggling couple enter a futuristic experiment to analyze their relationship, beginning a violent descent into madness with deadly consequences."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0154236/","name":"François Chau"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0923105/","name":"Tara Westwood"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3198287/","name":"Ione Butler"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3523072/","name":"Phillip G. Diablada
programme.desc: Diablada: Directed by Álvaro Muñoz. With Daniel Candia, Cristián Chaparro, Karin Mayorinca, Ernesto Meléndez. A group of girls from a little town in the desert, disappears systematically without the police or the authorities taking action on the matter. Families seek help, but are faced with bureaucracy, discrimination and total abandonment." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt14237412/","name":"Diablada","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjk5Y2VlZmMtOTY0NC00MzJhLWJkYjctNGY4ODA0YmQ4NDE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjUxNjk0ODc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of girls from a little town in the desert, disappears systematically without the police or the authorities taking action on the matter. Families seek help, but are faced with bureaucracy, discrimination and total abandonment.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt14237412/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"karolfancinema"},"dateCreated":"2021-06-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Distorting and taking advantage of a real tragedy, which affects the families of the real victims.","reviewBody":"Unfortunately, this film was made without the consent and rights of the real mothers of the victims. This film tells a real dramatic event, which even today opens wounds and consequences in the families of the victims, poor families that have not yet received real reparation from the state of Chile. Organizations for the protection of women in Chile are condemning this production that profits from this tragedy and is once again re-victimizing the case and affecting even more the families of the girls and women who suffered this real tragedy. That's horrible! This should have been a serious documentary of reparation for the victims and not a commercial product that also distorts reality.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":73,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2021-03-14","keywords":"northern chile,one word title,serial killer","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4461567/","name":"Daniel Candia"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1275107/","name":"Cristián Chaparro"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm12434889/","name":"Karin Mayorinca"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7100327/","name":"Álvaro Muñoz"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0583592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1146177/","name":"Omar Saavedra Santis"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: True Lies
Prawdziwe kłamstwa
True Lies
programme.desc: True Lies: Directed by James Cameron. With Arnold Schwarzenegger, Jamie Lee Curtis, Tom Arnold, Bill Paxton. A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used-car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United States." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0111503/","name":"True Lies","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzg5YmUyNGMtMThiNS00MjA2LTgwZDctNDlhM2RkZDNmZmRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDk3NzU2MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used-car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United Stat","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0111503/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ryan_kuhn"},"dateCreated":"2005-03-01","inLanguage":"English","name":""Can you hurry up. My horse is getting tired."","reviewBody":"James Cameron has directed some fantastic action movies during his career (Aliens, the first two Terminator movies, The Abyss, Titanic--that boat action was like totally awesome!!), but none were as funny as True Lies is. Arnold Schwarzenegger (Terminator, Eraser, the Governor of California) is Harry Tasker, a computer programming father by day, James Bond by night, working for a top secret government agency that is beyond the CIA and run by Charlton Heston. Tom Arnold, in his first dramatic role, plays Harry's partner, Gib, and is the smartass, class clown of the agency. Schwarzenegger and Arnold have a fantastic chemistry, creating the movie's biggest laughs. Jamie Lee Curtis plays Harry's under-appreciated wife, Helen, who flirts with the idea of leaving Harry for a used-car salesman, played with uber-confidence by Bill Paxson. Helen finds out the true identity of her husband in another funny scene where both are captured by Arab terrorists with help from a truth serum. The action part of True Lies comes from Harry trying to track down the nuclear bomb that has been stolen by the terrorists. A wonderfully shot escape scene on the bridge that connects the Florida Keys to the mainland is the pinnacle of True Lies. An action film that does not take itself too seriously (notice all of the silly Arnold-lines peppered throughout the movie, my personal favorite being "you're fired!" before Trump thought of it), True Lies is wildly entertaining, so much so that you almost forget Tom Arnold was married to Roseanne.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":249003,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1994-07-15","keywords":"secret agent,spy,secret mission,remake,tango","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"True Lies","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi284754201","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2VjYzU2N2YtZDQ5Yy00MDhhLWJhNDItOWRiODUyZmU1MzJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2VjYzU2N2YtZDQ5Yy00MDhhLWJhNDItOWRiODUyZmU1MzJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000216/","name":"Arnold Schwarzenegger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000130/","name":"Jamie Lee Curtis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000792/","name":"Tom Arnold"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000116/","name":"James Cameron"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038663/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0956022/","name":"Claude Zidi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0584770/","name":"Simon Michaël"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0436687/","name":"Didier Kaminka"}],"duration":"PT2H21M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
Spongebob: Na suchym lądzie
The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
programme.desc:
The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water: Directed by Paul Tibbitt, Mike Mitchell. With Antonio Banderas, Eric Bauza, Tim Conway, Eddie Deezen. When a diabolical pirate above the sea steals the secret Krabby Patty formula, SpongeBob and his nemesis Plankton must team up in order to get it back." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2279373/","name":"The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjYyNDczNTE0MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjkzNDYxMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a diabolical pirate above the sea steals the secret Krabby Patty formula, SpongeBob and his nemesis Plankton must team up in order to get it back.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2279373/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Drive-in_Zeppelin"},"dateCreated":"2015-02-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Nautical Nonsense takes on a whole new dimension (literally)","reviewBody":"Seriously though, unless you have been living under a rock like Patrick the starfish for the last few decades, you should at least have formed an opinion about the Spongebob series. It has a talking sponge that lives in a pineapple, flips burgers, and goes on nonsensical adventures with his slow-witted friend and neighbor. You either find it whimsical and funny or you don't. 

This holds true for the second feature film Sponge Out of Water as we find our beloved residents of Bikini Bottom forced to enter our three dimensional world for the first time. After a flamboyant pirate (Antonio Banderas) manages to steal the much sought after secret Krabby Patty recipe using a magic book, Spongebob and co. have their world plunged into anarchy with the sudden loss of the greasy burgers.

As expected (if you watched the show as a kid), our heroes have to go on a series of misadventures to recover the secret recipe and stop the mischievous pirate after he commits industrial theft. 

The thing your probably not expecting (if you've seen the trailer), is only a very small portion of this short film is actually 3D. It's not glaringly awful, and actually seems to work fairly well in a movie about abstract craziness that features time-traveling dolphins.

It's fun, plain and simple. The children in the audience we're giggling with delight, the adults found humor enough to laugh, and all in all I appreciated the blatant references to movies like Mad Max, Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy, and The Shining. It's a movie that is directed at children, but is enriched with plenty of adult humor in the form of puns and famous movies references. 

Just enjoy it for what it is and you won't be disappointed. The animation is surreal and enjoyable as always, the voice-acting is tried and true, and everyone in the theater seemed to enjoy it thoroughly. 

Mild drug use is recommended for optimal viewing and humor extraction. 

Read the full review and others like it on the Drive-In Zeppelin website.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":52775,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2015-01-30","keywords":"dinosaur,formula,plankton,secret formula,bubble","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi421768985","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTY1NDEwNTY2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODMwNjYxMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTY1NDEwNTY2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODMwNjYxMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"After spending his entire life under the sea in the Bikini Bottom Gulch, Spongebob, Patrick and the rest of their friends go on a quest to find the stolen recipe for their Krabby Patty burgers, which brings them into our world, where they encounter a nefarious pirate named Burger-Beard.
"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0444786/","name":"Tom Kenny"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000104/","name":"Antonio Banderas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0265067/","name":"Bill Fagerbakke"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1196684/","name":"Paul Tibbitt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593610/","name":"Mike Mitchell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0390995/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0004265/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020957/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0008743/","name":"Jonathan Aibel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0074184/","name":"Glenn Berger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0384864/","name":"Stephen Hillenburg"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Dark Crystal
Ciemny kryształ
The Dark Crystal
programme.desc: The Dark Crystal: Directed by Jim Henson, Frank Oz. With Jim Henson, Kathryn Mullen, Frank Oz, Dave Goelz. On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and to restore order to his world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0083791/","name":"The Dark Crystal","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTU2MmJiZmQtZjBmMS00MTk4LWFmOWYtZGQzOTY5ODNjYWVhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and to restore order to his world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0083791/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"winstonsmith_84"},"dateCreated":"2000-12-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Dream","reviewBody":"This movie is like an odd, but wonderful dream. It takes place in a fantasy world, created by the talented duo, Frank Oz and Jim Henson. Everything in this film is so meticulously done, that it still lives on to this day. Computer effects be damned. This film has texture, and it is pleasing to watch. This movie, as you will see, was made for kids. But really, it is a masterpiece in film-making. True, good, story-telling. Sure, kids will love it, but the film isn't really aimed at them like most kid movies are. It is complicated, eerie, beautiful, and intelligent... most of all, mystical. I reccomend this to anyone seriously interested in film, especially fantasy... not to be missed!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":64689,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Family","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"1982-12-17","keywords":"puppetry,magical crystal,crystal shard,cult favorite,puppet","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Teaser","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi629389593","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDEzMjBjM2QtN2Y0Mi00ZGY4LTgzZTYtYTQwZWZiYzIyMjc0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDEzMjBjM2QtN2Y0Mi00ZGY4LTgzZTYtYTQwZWZiYzIyMjc0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Rediscover the age of wonder inspired by Jim Henson's groundbreaking vision. On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and to restore order to his world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0083791/","name":"The Dark Crystal","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTU2MmJiZmQtZjBmMS00MTk4LWFmOWYtZGQzOTY5ODNjYWVhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and to restore order to his world.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0083791/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"winstonsmith_84","dateCreated":"2000-12-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Dream","reviewBody":"This movie is like an odd, but wonderful dream. It takes place in a fantasy world, created by the talented duo, Frank Oz and Jim Henson. Everything in this film is so meticulously done, that it still lives on to this day. Computer effects be damned. This film has texture, and it is pleasing to watch. This movie, as you will see, was made for kids. But really, it is a masterpiece in film-making. True, good, story-telling. Sure, kids will love it, but the film isn't really aimed at them like most kid movies are. It is complicated, eerie, beautiful, and intelligent... most of all, mystical. I reccomend this to anyone seriously interested in film, especially fantasy... not to be missed!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":64689,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Family","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"1982-12-17","keywords":"puppetry,magical crystal,crystal shard,cult favorite,puppet","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Teaser","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi629389593","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDEzMjBjM2QtN2Y0Mi00ZGY4LTgzZTYtYTQwZWZiYzIyMjc0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDEzMjBjM2QtN2Y0Mi00ZGY4LTgzZTYtYTQwZWZiYzIyMjc0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Rediscover the age of wonder inspired by Jim Henson's groundbreaking vision. programme.title: Jojo Rabbit
Jojo Rabbit
programme.desc:
Jojo Rabbit: Directed by Taika Waititi. With Roman Griffin Davis, Thomasin McKenzie, Scarlett Johansson, Taika Waititi. A young German boy in the Hitler Youth whose hero and imaginary friend is the country's dictator is shocked to discover that his mother is hiding a Jewish girl in their home." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2584384/","name":"Jojo Rabbit","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjU0Yzk2MzEtMjAzYy00MzY0LTg2YmItM2RkNzdkY2ZhN2JkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDg4NjY5OTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young German boy in the Hitler Youth whose hero and imaginary friend is the country's dictator is shocked to discover that his mother is hiding a Jewish girl in their home.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2584384/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"EvilMissQB"},"dateCreated":"2019-11-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Moving, hilarious...tragic","reviewBody":"The trailer for the movie had me scratching my head but as a HUGE fan of Waititi I felt I ought to give it a shot.

My best spoiler free review is that this is an original, outrageous film. The emotional gamut we are subjected to is whiplash inducing, but without the neck brace and ambulance chasing lawyers.

Every actor is perfection. Young JoJo and Yorkie are devastatingly earnest and so talented. Sam Rockwell is always a master. Every subtle satire is underwritten with a grim level of truth. The soundtrack n unexpected choice.

Go see it. Prepare yourself for quite a ride.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":346196,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2019-10-24","keywords":"nazi germany,world war two,satire,mother son relationship,black comedy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2663366425","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGIzMWMzMTgtZjNmOC00ZTMyLWJkZDItZWUxNGQ0OWNhMzFhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGIzMWMzMTgtZjNmOC00ZTMyLWJkZDItZWUxNGQ0OWNhMzFhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Writer director Taika Waititi (THOR: RAGNAROK, HUNT FOR THE WILDERPEOPLE), brings his signature style of humor and pathos to his latest film, JOJO RABBIT, a World War II satire that follows a lonely German boy (Roman Griffin Davis as JoJo) whose world view is turned upside down when he discovers his single mother (Scarlett Johansson) is hiding a young Jewish girl (Thomasin McKenzie) in their attic. Aided only by his idiotic imaginary friend, Adolf Hitler (Taika Waititi), Jojo must confront his blind nationalism."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9877392/","name":"Roman Griffin Davis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5057169/","name":"Thomasin McKenzie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0424060/","name":"Scarlett Johansson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0169806/","name":"Taika Waititi"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0420822/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0537672/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0118715/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9862836/","name":"Christine Leunens"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0169806/","name":"Taika Waititi"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: True Lies
Prawdziwe kłamstwa
True Lies
programme.desc: True Lies: Directed by James Cameron. With Arnold Schwarzenegger, Jamie Lee Curtis, Tom Arnold, Bill Paxton. A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used-car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United States." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0111503/","name":"True Lies","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzg5YmUyNGMtMThiNS00MjA2LTgwZDctNDlhM2RkZDNmZmRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDk3NzU2MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used-car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United Stat","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0111503/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ryan_kuhn"},"dateCreated":"2005-03-01","inLanguage":"English","name":""Can you hurry up. My horse is getting tired."","reviewBody":"James Cameron has directed some fantastic action movies during his career (Aliens, the first two Terminator movies, The Abyss, Titanic--that boat action was like totally awesome!!), but none were as funny as True Lies is. Arnold Schwarzenegger (Terminator, Eraser, the Governor of California) is Harry Tasker, a computer programming father by day, James Bond by night, working for a top secret government agency that is beyond the CIA and run by Charlton Heston. Tom Arnold, in his first dramatic role, plays Harry's partner, Gib, and is the smartass, class clown of the agency. Schwarzenegger and Arnold have a fantastic chemistry, creating the movie's biggest laughs. Jamie Lee Curtis plays Harry's under-appreciated wife, Helen, who flirts with the idea of leaving Harry for a used-car salesman, played with uber-confidence by Bill Paxson. Helen finds out the true identity of her husband in another funny scene where both are captured by Arab terrorists with help from a truth serum. The action part of True Lies comes from Harry trying to track down the nuclear bomb that has been stolen by the terrorists. A wonderfully shot escape scene on the bridge that connects the Florida Keys to the mainland is the pinnacle of True Lies. An action film that does not take itself too seriously (notice all of the silly Arnold-lines peppered throughout the movie, my personal favorite being "you're fired!" before Trump thought of it), True Lies is wildly entertaining, so much so that you almost forget Tom Arnold was married to Roseanne.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":249003,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1994-07-15","keywords":"secret agent,spy,secret mission,remake,tango","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"True Lies","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi284754201","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2VjYzU2N2YtZDQ5Yy00MDhhLWJhNDItOWRiODUyZmU1MzJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2VjYzU2N2YtZDQ5Yy00MDhhLWJhNDItOWRiODUyZmU1MzJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000216/","name":"Arnold Schwarzenegger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000130/","name":"Jamie Lee Curtis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000792/","name":"Tom Arnold"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000116/","name":"James Cameron"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038663/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0956022/","name":"Claude Zidi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0584770/","name":"Simon Michaël"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0436687/","name":"Didier Kaminka"}],"duration":"PT2H21M"}</script><metacontent="

A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used-car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United States." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0111503/","name":"True Lies","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzg5YmUyNGMtMThiNS00MjA2LTgwZDctNDlhM2RkZDNmZmRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDk3NzU2MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used-car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United Stat","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0111503/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ryan_kuhn","dateCreated":"2005-03-01","inLanguage":"English","name":""Can you hurry up. My horse is getting tired."","reviewBody":"James Cameron has directed some fantastic action movies during his career (Aliens, the first two Terminator movies, The Abyss, Titanic--that boat action was like totally awesome!!), but none were as funny as True Lies is. Arnold Schwarzenegger (Terminator, Eraser, the Governor of California) is Harry Tasker, a computer programming father by day, James Bond by night, working for a top secret government agency that is beyond the CIA and run by Charlton Heston. Tom Arnold, in his first dramatic role, plays Harry's partner, Gib, and is the smartass, class clown of the agency. Schwarzenegger and Arnold have a fantastic chemistry, creating the movie's biggest laughs. Jamie Lee Curtis plays Harry's under-appreciated wife, Helen, who flirts with the idea of leaving Harry for a used-car salesman, played with uber-confidence by Bill Paxson. Helen finds out the true identity of her husband in another funny scene where both are captured by Arab terrorists with help from a truth serum. The action part of True Lies comes from Harry trying to track down the nuclear bomb that has been stolen by the terrorists. A wonderfully shot escape scene on the bridge that connects the Florida Keys to the mainland is the pinnacle of True Lies. An action film that does not take itself too seriously (notice all of the silly Arnold-lines peppered throughout the movie, my personal favorite being "you're fired!" before Trump thought of it), True Lies is wildly entertaining, so much so that you almost forget Tom Arnold was married to Roseanne.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":249003,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1994-07-15","keywords":"secret agent,spy,secret mission,remake,tango","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"True Lies","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi284754201","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2VjYzU2N2YtZDQ5Yy00MDhhLWJhNDItOWRiODUyZmU1MzJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2VjYzU2N2YtZDQ5Yy00MDhhLWJhNDItOWRiODUyZmU1MzJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000216/","name":"Arnold Schwarzenegger","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000130/","name":"Jamie Lee Curtis","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000792/","name":"Tom Arnold"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000116/","name":"James Cameron"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038663/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0956022/","name":"Claude Zidi","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0584770/","name":"Simon Michaël","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0436687/","name":"Didier Kaminka"],"duration":"PT2H21M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
Spongebob: Na suchym lądzie
The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
programme.desc:
The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water: Directed by Paul Tibbitt, Mike Mitchell. With Antonio Banderas, Eric Bauza, Tim Conway, Eddie Deezen. When a diabolical pirate above the sea steals the secret Krabby Patty formula, SpongeBob and his nemesis Plankton must team up in order to get it back." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2279373/","name":"The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjYyNDczNTE0MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjkzNDYxMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a diabolical pirate above the sea steals the secret Krabby Patty formula, SpongeBob and his nemesis Plankton must team up in order to get it back.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2279373/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Drive-in_Zeppelin"},"dateCreated":"2015-02-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Nautical Nonsense takes on a whole new dimension (literally)","reviewBody":"Seriously though, unless you have been living under a rock like Patrick the starfish for the last few decades, you should at least have formed an opinion about the Spongebob series. It has a talking sponge that lives in a pineapple, flips burgers, and goes on nonsensical adventures with his slow-witted friend and neighbor. You either find it whimsical and funny or you don't. 

This holds true for the second feature film Sponge Out of Water as we find our beloved residents of Bikini Bottom forced to enter our three dimensional world for the first time. After a flamboyant pirate (Antonio Banderas) manages to steal the much sought after secret Krabby Patty recipe using a magic book, Spongebob and co. have their world plunged into anarchy with the sudden loss of the greasy burgers.

As expected (if you watched the show as a kid), our heroes have to go on a series of misadventures to recover the secret recipe and stop the mischievous pirate after he commits industrial theft. 

The thing your probably not expecting (if you've seen the trailer), is only a very small portion of this short film is actually 3D. It's not glaringly awful, and actually seems to work fairly well in a movie about abstract craziness that features time-traveling dolphins.

It's fun, plain and simple. The children in the audience we're giggling with delight, the adults found humor enough to laugh, and all in all I appreciated the blatant references to movies like Mad Max, Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy, and The Shining. It's a movie that is directed at children, but is enriched with plenty of adult humor in the form of puns and famous movies references. 

Just enjoy it for what it is and you won't be disappointed. The animation is surreal and enjoyable as always, the voice-acting is tried and true, and everyone in the theater seemed to enjoy it thoroughly. 

Mild drug use is recommended for optimal viewing and humor extraction. 

Read the full review and others like it on the Drive-In Zeppelin website.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":52775,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2015-01-30","keywords":"dinosaur,formula,plankton,secret formula,bubble","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi421768985","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTY1NDEwNTY2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODMwNjYxMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTY1NDEwNTY2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODMwNjYxMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"After spending his entire life under the sea in the Bikini Bottom Gulch, Spongebob, Patrick and the rest of their friends go on a quest to find the stolen recipe for their Krabby Patty burgers, which brings them into our world, where they encounter a nefarious pirate named Burger-Beard.
"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0444786/","name":"Tom Kenny"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000104/","name":"Antonio Banderas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0265067/","name":"Bill Fagerbakke"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1196684/","name":"Paul Tibbitt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593610/","name":"Mike Mitchell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0390995/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0004265/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020957/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0008743/","name":"Jonathan Aibel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0074184/","name":"Glenn Berger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0384864/","name":"Stephen Hillenburg"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="
