Impostor
programme.desc: Impostor: Directed by Gary Fleder. With Gary Sinise, Madeleine Stowe, Vincent D'Onofrio, Tony Shalhoub. In the future, an alien race uses androids as bombs to attack Earth. A government weapons specialist is accused of being one such android and sets out to prove his innocence." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0160399/","name":"Impostor","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmUyOGI5YjYtN2IzNC00MTQzLWJhZjYtZDI1YmI3N2VjNGJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTY5Nzc4MDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the future, an alien race uses androids as bombs to attack Earth. A government weapons specialist is accused of being one such android and sets out to prove his innocence.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0160399/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Silvermax268"},"dateCreated":"2004-08-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"How many more great stories of his our out there I have not read!","reviewBody":"This Movie was great! What I really wanna know is how much it differs from the book. I also enjoyed paycheck & although I, Robot was not one of his short stories it sure felt like one. This movie especially the first time I saw it had me hoping for one thing, then expecting another & then just when I thought I had it figured out it all blew up in my face...(literally) OUTSTANDING! See it! Much like Riddick! this Movie & story is just plain Great Sci-FI! Gary does an outstanding job convincing you that he is indeed not guilty, then you have trouble believing him as he starts to doubt himself, the whole time thinking maybe the government is just crazy, but slowly you put the pieces together & just when you think you know who or what he/she is... Just see it, it is amazing SCI-FI! I am going to buy a copy right now. ENJOY!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":23348,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2002-01-04","keywords":"watching tv,chair bondage,botox,slums,nasty face","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Impostor: Director's Cut","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1105789209","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTE4YWE4NTEtNzE4NS00NjgwLWE5ODItYjNiZjY3NWE2YTUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTE4YWE4NTEtNzE4NS00NjgwLWE5ODItYjNiZjY3NWE2YTUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Miramax"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0111274/","name":"Shane Brolly"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000352/","name":"Vincent D'Onofrio"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000641/","name":"Gary Sinise"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001219/","name":"Gary Fleder"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019626/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042119/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001140/","name":"Philip K. programme.title: U Pana Boga w ogródku
U Pana Boga w ogródku
programme.desc: U Pana Boga w ogródku: Directed by Jacek Bromski. With Krzysztof Dzierma, Andrzej Beja-Zaborski, Wojciech Solarz, Emilian Kaminski. Marian, the worst graduate of police academy, joins the police force in the small town of Krolowy Most and immediately falls in love with pregnant daughter of the police chief. Meanwhile, crown witness in the mafia case comes to the town." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1105300/","name":"U Pana Boga w ogródku","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODJjZDI2MzUtZjczMi00MTczLTg5YjEtYWMwYjdlYWViMGZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjk0MjI4MjI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Marian, the worst graduate of police academy, joins the police force in the small town of Krolowy Most and immediately falls in love with pregnant daughter of the police chief. Meanwhile, crown witness in the mafia case comes to the ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1105300/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"lord_terabyte"},"dateCreated":"2012-09-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Charming comedy","reviewBody":"This is not a film that is pretentious. Instead, it is a rather charming comedy and a nice film to watch if you are looking for some easy laughs. As the other review said, some of the characters are clichéd - so what? If you are an American watching this you will be transported into a world you likely never knew existed. It always interests me to see how people are the same wherever they are in the world, and also how they are different. We have in this film a clash between the impersonal modern world, and a slower way of life where everyone is connected. I think anyone who is disappointed by this film simply expected it to be something that it is not.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":737,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2007-08-31","keywords":"village priest,provincial life,peeping tom,drunk driving,witness","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0246198/","name":"Krzysztof Dzierma"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0067329/","name":"Andrzej Beja-Zaborski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2028804/","name":"Wojciech Solarz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0111369/","name":"Jacek Bromski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0111369/","name":"Jacek Bromski"}],"duration":"PT1H55M"}</script><metacontent="

Instead, it is a rather charming comedy and a nice film to watch if you are looking for some easy laughs. As the other review said, some of the characters are clichéd - so what? If you are an American watching this you will be transported into a world you likely never knew existed. It always interests me to see how people are the same wherever they are in the world, and also how they are different. We have in this film a clash between the impersonal modern world, and a slower way of life where everyone is connected.
